story:
Dear friends and family,

I come to you all humbly and honestly with an ambitious request for your support in my pursuit to join the Ohio University Tropical Disease and Research Program in Ecuador this summer. The Tropical Disease Institute at Ohio University seeks to improve the health status of underserved populations through sustainable and comprehensive research, service and educational initiatives related to infectious diseases.(Specifically Chagas Disease- see video for more info on)

I have an amazing opportunity at hand; I was accepted into this program and found out a few weeks back that I received the Benjamin A. Gilman scholarship. This scholarship covers about half of my costs. Since I received the scholarship I have continued to pray, and search for ways to make this happen believing in my heart that if it is where I am meant to be- I will get there. In just the past few weeks I have received grants and support from the dean of The Health and Science Profession at OU, The Knights of Columbus, and a former coach. I have had to extend my trip to meet scholarship requirements which has increased my cost over $1500...leaving me far short in funds. I am in need of assistance of any kind- so I come to you all.


I had mentioned a little bit of this on facebook; but haven't really gotten the chance to explain why I am going/ what I will be doing overseas for this upcoming month. This June I am joining a team of students with the TDI programin Quito, Ecuador, a study abroad experience that I welcome because it involves hands- on work with the local community involving medical research, treatment, and education. This program also offers course credits that will support my current and future educational goals and will enhance my Spanish skills tremendously. As a group we will be working on-Clinical Research and Primary Health Care in the Community,Clinical Research in the Hospitals, Healthy Living Development against Chagas,Water Projects, Health Education, Laboratory Research, Housing Census/ Construction (prevention of infestation) etc...

 

I continue to pray and am humbled at the opportunities and direction I have been blessed with. I believe this is a footstep into a life of medical relief, research, and tangible service. The research being done on Chagas disease is vital in improving the health of these communities and future generations to come; it is a disease all of us will be hearing about and recognize as a "silent killer". I do not want to pass up this opportunity; i want to help. I know this email is WAY TO LONG and you are all very busy, but hopefully this gives a good grasp on what I am doing and that any bit of help would be greatly appreciated. I will be gone from June 1- July 8th.

If anyone has any questions about the program or how to donate on this site...Don't hesitate to contact me!
:614-592-4707

ct074010@ohio.edu


facebook or mail to me at :
1283 East Kenworth Rd Columbus OH 43224

 

More info on TDI...

About TDI

 

The Tropical Disease Institute was founded in 1987 by a group of visionary scientists that wanted to pull in their combine expertise and resources towards the improvement of the life of the people in disease endemic areas.

 

Training of students: Since its initiation, TDI faculty have provided training to students from the USA and developing countries at the undergraduate and graduate levels. The Institute's education abroad programs were initiated in 1995. Ever since then, more than 180 students from more than 20 universities in the USA, Europe, New Zealand and other countries have participated in the workshops and research training programs carried out in Ecuador.

 

Research projects: TDI's research projects have included immunoparasitological studies in experimental mouse models of Chagas disease, vectorial competence of mosquitoes to transmit Venezuelan Equine Encephalitis and Rift Valley Fever virus, safety of the blood supply, Chagas disease epidemiology in Ecuador and in the USA, among others.

 

The contributions of TDI:  Faculty and students have been instrumental in the initiation of a Chagas disease control and T. cruzi blood screeningprograms in Ecuador. The blood bank initiative has lead to a major improvement of the safety of the blood supply in Ecuador. These endeavors have had a major impact on the lives of the Ecuadorian people.

 

Our partnerships: Ecuador has been the focus of TDIs international activities. A close network of collaborators has been established with governmental and non-governmental organizations in the country. A cooperation agreement with Catholic University of Ecuador, one of the most prestigious universities in Ecuador, has allowed for the creation of tangible research infrastructure in the country and the implementation of ambitious and successful research, service and education programs.

story:
ME Clock is the Ultimate Digital Life Coach: a personal trainer for your mind that empowers you to become the ME you want to BE. Whether your goal is becoming thinner, richer, happier, fitter and smarter or conquering stress, low self-esteem, or poor energy levels, this is the revolutionary system and product that can make it happen.

We are all creatures of habit, and bad habits, formed by years of negative thought patterns, that can be hard to break. That’s where ME Clock enters the picture – using technology, it empowers you to create and sustain positive habits on-demand anytime, anywhere.

In one elegant product, we have incorporated all the best proven practices for enhancing and transforming a person’s life. ME Clock delivers ME System 24, a very specific sequence of targeted mind empowering exercises, behavioural modification, learning techniques, emotive music and meditation to help you keep your life on track 24/7 at the press of a button. Our exclusive training system has taken over 10 years of development at our clinic in Harley Street – the address for cutting-edge wellness practices in London.

In one sleek, stylish and simple to use product, we have combined all you need to help you achieve any goal in life. A groundbreaking hi-tech consumer product that incorporates millennia of self-improvement thought and practices, ME Clock marks a new era in personal development - and now you can be among the first to own it.

 

 

HELP US CHANGE LIVES

We embarked on this journey because we have seen first-hand the incredible life-changing results ME System 24 achieved as a method on so many people at our clinic. We wanted to be able to offer it to the world, not just those with access to the exclusive Harley Street environment. That led us on a two-year journey of how to administer ME System 24 through a consumer product which culminated in ME Clock and ME Clock App. With your support, we now want to change as many lives as we can around the world.

HOW DOES IT WORK?

ME Clock helps you overcome negative thought patterns that have built up over time and prevented you from being the ME you want to BE. Think of your mind like a computer. For a computer to perform at an optimum level, negative programs (or viruses) need to be removed and replaced with fresh applications and positive programs. The result is a faster more efficient computer that completes any task you assign, without stalling or breaking down. ME Clock retrains you to use your mind to overcome these negative thought patterns, allowing you to flourish and effortlessly achieve your goals.

 

The latest brain science says that when your mind wants something and your emotions agree, you win. But if there is conflict, you lose. To achieve any goal you want, your mind and emotions need to be in sync. ME Clock helps bridge this gap. That’s when change occurs and positive habits are born.

 

CHANGE YOUR LIFE AS YOU SLEEP

ME Clock is used before, during and after you sleep, enabling you to make the most of your down time. Instead of spending your day chasing your dreams, you can now spend your day living your dreams. Minimum effort for maximum effect – that’s ME Clock.

The ME System 24 training protocol, delivered by ME Clock via ME Programs and ME 101, consists of:

  • ME-START – 10 minutes each morning to motivate and energize you for the day ahead, tailored with empowering scripts in relation to the ME Program you’re working on.
  • ME-FRESH – 15 minutes each evening to clear all the cumulative stresses of the day from your mind and body, preparing you for a restful night’s sleep through audio scripts correlating to the ME Program you’re working on. 
  • ME-SET – works as you sleep, helping you to eliminate negative thought patterns relevant to the ME Program you’re working on. While you are in the right part of sleep, ME Clock or ME Clock App plays a track for 45 minutes. The track is delivered at a very low audible level, to keep you soundly asleep as it helps you dissolve negative patterns and replaces them with positive thoughts.

HOW TO BECOME THE ME YOU WANT TO BE

  1. Sign up for a ME Clock or ME Clock App pledge package.
  2. When your package arrives, do the ME 101 program for 7 days to become level-set.
  3. Select any ME Program from your pledge package that corresponds to the area in your life where you want to see positive change and use for 7-21 days.
  4. Use Sleep Solutions, ME Sound, Nature Sounds and ME Books as support for your mind & emotions whenever you need it.
  5. Meet the New You.

 

 

WHAT DOES COME WITH?

  • ME 101 – a 7-day entry level program to get your mind and emotions level-set before moving onto specific ME Programs.
  • Sleep Solutions – to help you achieve a better night’s rest.
  • ME Sound – music to stimulate your mind and emotions any time of the day or night.
  • Nature Sounds & White Noise - to help you achieve the right ambient environment in any room of your home.
  • ME Books – to help guide you on your journey.

(Sleep Solutions, ME Sound, Nature Sounds & White Noise and ME Books are collectively known as the Lifestyle Suite.)

 

* ME Clock is also a stylish digital alarm clock radio and stereo designed to fit into any bedroom space.

 

 

HOW IS APP DIFFERENT?

ME Clock App has exactly the same functionality as ME Clock, but the audio is delivered through the phone’s speaker, headphones, or docking station. The audio was created to work perfectly with your Android or iPhone speaker. Those who are happy to have their phone in their bedroom or are always on the move may prefer ME Clock App to ME Clock.

The App is available for iPhone and Android platforms.

 

 

WHAT ARE THE DIFFERENT ME PROGRAMS?

 There are 12 life-changing ME programs:

 

 

Each ME Program comes with 3 separate levels to be completed sequentially. Each level takes 7-21 days to complete (7 days if you do the 3-step process, 21 days if you just listen to ME Set in your sleep).

 

 

HOW DO I KNOW IT WORKS?

Because over the past 10- years integrated medicine expert and personal development coach, Mike Squirrell, developed ME System 24 at his Harley Street clinic in London and successfully administered it as a therapy on thousands of patients including professional athletes, business executives, royalty and celebrities

 Here is what a few of them have said about ME System 24:

 

“Mike Squirrell is one of the most inspiring people I have ever encountered. When I first met him at his practice on Harley Street it's fair to say I didn't quite know what to expect in terms of results but after just one session of his ME System 24 treatment I was blown away. The energy created in the room that day was so powerful it opened me up to the amazing possibilities within me. It made me realise that change for the greater good of myself and those near to me was not only possible but easy. After a few more treatments the change in me in terms of what I could achieve, how I felt about myself, the improvement in all my personal relationships, how possible it is to achieve my goals in life and make personal dreams come true are now deeply instilled in me. I'll never forget the confidence and amazing energy that ME System 24 gave me. To this day like I was after my very first session I'm brimming with confidence and energy, feel like I'm 10 ft. tall and that anything is possible.”

Craig Kelly - Celebrity, Actor, TV Personality, London

 

“Mike is quite simply a miracle healer in every sense of the word!”

Amanda Ghost - Music Producer, 3-time Grammy Nominee, London

 

“After walking away from my last ME System 24 treatment I felt quite light-headed and suddenly optimistic. By the end of that week Mike's magic was like a crazy miracle, all the heavy grief had lifted. I could think clearly and not feel so broken-hearted; the following week I was excited to embrace independent life. Mike allowed me this re-gaining of my former self. He is the best kept secret in the world of Harley Street medicine!”

Jemima Jones - Fashion Model, London

WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

We have now designed, developed and built the ME Clock prototype by working with award-winning London design agency “Therefore” (who were behind the successful “Gravity Light” Indiegogo campaign last year). We have also designed and built a Beta version of ME Clock App, launched our website, and recorded the 12 ME Programs and additional features at our London studio totaling 50 hours of mastered content.

To get ME Clock into the marketplace, we now need your help. With your contributions, we can fund production costs, expand the size of our team and increase our marketing outreach.

We have spent the last two years and all of our own funding getting ME Clock to the verge of market launch. By reserving a ME Clock now, you can make this happen. With the funds for our first production run, we can expose ME Clock to a community of early adopters who will help spread the word to a bigger marketplace as quickly as possible and build a nonprofit organization through which we can donate our training methods to schools and the disadvantaged.

Our goal is to get ME Clock and ME Clock App into as many people’s hands as possible to help change as many lives around the world as we can – starting with yours!

                                   Thank you for your support!

story:
About Water Ecuador

Water shouldn't be brown.  It shouldn't taste bad or have dirt in it.  And when you put it in a petri dish, it shouldn't grow thick, red colonies of bacteria.  In Isla Puna, a small island 4 hours from the Ecuadorian city of Guayaquil, we found some of the dirtiest water we've ever seen, and it makes people ill.  And we're teaming up with Cecilia  Villar Eljuri to change that.

Water Ecuador (www.waterecuador.org) is a non-profit based in Muisne, a rural town in coastal Ecuador.  We were founded in 2007, and focus on innovative, high-impact, measurable solutions to comprehensively address the global water crisis.  We take a social entrepreneurial approach to our work, believing that development should be long-term and self-sustaining.   A good drinking water program empowers a community to provide itself with clean water every day, generation after generation, not simply for a few months or years, and in order to do so, we form lasting relationships with the communities where we work. 

Currently, we run 6 small water centers in rural Ecuador that provide clean water to over 2000 people daily as well as running several educational initiatives to teach children and adults about the importance of clean water.  We plan to build our 7th on Isla Puna and to raise money with a concert.

The Water Ecuador - Eljuri Connection

Cecilia Villar Eljuri (www.eljurimusic.com) and Alex Harding met in 2008 when both were just starting out on their solo careers following their passions. Cecilia to write and perform her own music on a global stage as a solo artist and Alex to spread good health by providing access to clean water in poor rural communities throughout Ecuador. Since then they have supported each other's visions, leading to this fundraising initiative to build a Water Center on the Island of Puna in Ecuador.

Eljuri is an Ecuadorian singer-songwriter whose powerful Latin rock fusion, soaring guitars & relevant lyrics inspire the fight for individual freedom. Her message of empowerment motivates a diverse audience from young children, to a vibrant youth and seasoned music lovers of all ages and cultures. She was born in Guayaquil, raised in NYC and tours internationally spreading her message of empowerment and motivation. The press often refers to her as "Carlita" because her soaring electric guitar solos are reminiscent of Carlos Santana's. She is touted as one of the top Latina guitarists in the world and has been supported by the Gibson family of brands since 2008.

What We Need & What You Get

Here is the plan in a bit more detail.

  • We need to raise about $16,000 to build a water center.  (Here is the budget breakdown from our last center which opened in March 2013).
  • Once a water center is open, it stays sustainable by charging a very low cost for the water -- 1/2 to 1/6 of the market cost and just enough to pay our water center manager and for any repairs.
  • We are raising money from several sources for the project and have thus far received generous donations from Chobani and the Rotary Club of Essex Connecticut.
  • We have teamed up with Cecilia Villar Eljuri to host a Water Ecuador benefit concert on October 9th to help us move $2000 closer to our goal.

The Impact

  • The Isla Puna community will receive clean water.
  • A water center manager gets a job to support his or her family.
  • You get to attend an awesome concert on October 9th, and get some other great freebies.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute now, we'd still love your help!

  • Share the Indiegogo campaign on Facebook or Twitter.
  • Donate your time or subscribe to our email list.
  • Learn about the world water crisis and talk about it with a friend or two!

story:
Cutting Edge Technology For Swimmers

 

 
 

The Phlex EDGE is the first fitness tracker created by swimmers, for swimmers. This revolutionary hardware incorporates patented machine learning technology to provide real-time heart rate for swimmers, advanced stroke analysis, and thousands of professionally written workouts all in a seamlessly designed, and incredibly intuitive device worn on-goggle.

 

In The Press 

 

Why Not A Watch? 

You wouldn't run a marathon in sandals, so why train for swimming wearing a watch. Watches and chest-worn heart rate monitors are cumbersome and bulky, which increases the chances that your stroke will suffer. Lose those inefficiencies and embrace the EDGE technology, a head based, hydrodynamic design that's virtually unnoticeable when being worn.

 

All In One Solution

 

 

It's as simple as threading your goggle strap through the EDGE and going for a swim. The process has been designed to be as simple as possible so that you can focus more on your workout. The EDGE is designed to fit most popular goggles.

 

Become A Better Swimmer

 

Are you training for a Triathlon? Or to get fit in the New Year? For your health? Or for the next Olympics? No matter what you're training for, the EDGE is designed by swimmers, for swimmers to meet the goals that YOU have set.

 

Train More Efficiently 

 

The EDGE actively learns what kind of swimmer YOU are by recognizing workout structure, sets, strokes, and intervals. It even finds inefficiencies in the way you train, then recommends ways to fix them.

 

Improve Your Technique

 

The EDGE utilizes biometric and inertial sensors to track over 30 swimming metrics during training, which are then interpreted to provide technical analysis and stroke tips post workout.

Metrics Include:

  • Distance
  • Calories
  • Pace
  • Stroke (type) 
  • Stroke Count
  • Cadence
  • Workout Dynamics
    • Set
    • Stroke
    • Distance
    • Pace
    • Overall Time
    • Heart Rate
  • Real-Time Heart Rate
  • Kicks off Wall
  • SWOLF Score
  • Distance Per Stroke
  • Endurance Zones

 

Stay In Your Training Zone

 

Smart tracking alerts you of your current Heart Rate zone with haptic feedback vibrations. The ability to track your heart rate in real time is THE most important analytic to have during a workout.

 

Stay Connected Anywhere

 
 

Our cloud-based algorithm allows you to view your training data anytime, anywhere with the Phlex Swim app. 

 

Free Your Wrists

 

 
Designed to seamlessly fit any swimmers lifestyle, the EDGE fits most popular goggle straps with a hydrodynamic design that will feel like it's not even there. Swimmers shouldn't be training with anything but a suit, cap, and goggles with an EDGE.
 
 

Reinvent The Way You Train

 

The Phlex Swim App offers thousands of professionally written workouts by Olympians, Iron Men, and Elite Coaches. Whether you're trying to learn a new stroke or stay fit, we've got workouts for everyone.

 

Stay Motivated With Goals

 
 

Crush your goals and stay motivated by keeping track in-app by comparing yourself to friends, teammates, or global distance challenges like the English Channel. Experience improvement and feel the benefits of your progress.

 

Learn From The Pros

 
 

Take advantage of exclusive industry leading stroke and drill content, taught by the top athletes in the world and tailored to your specific swimming needs.

 

 

 

For Swimmers

 

For Coaches

 

 

Workout Analytics

Fitness tracking apps are often clunky and make analytics difficult to access. We display your biometric data in an easy to use dashboard. Featuring tabs for overall workout highlights, distance and time (splits), cardio, and technique where our machine learning technology analyzes your stroke to provide feedback and tips.


 

Workout Database 

The Phlex Swim App has thousands of professionally written workouts providing a range of training plans to lose weight and get in shape fast, train for the Olympics, and everything in between.

 

Goal Setting 

We all know how difficult it is to stay motivated throughout a workout. Together the EDGE and Phlex Swim App allow you to set goals to enhance your progress. Compete with friends and teammates to conquer real-world bodies of water with challenges.

 

This video is an example of a Phlex data collection with the machine learning algorithm overlay. As you can see, the bottom metrics update as the swimmer moves through the water, indicating stroke, kicks, stroke count, time, laps, etc. A good indicator of some of the more basic metrics that the EDGE can collect, the deeper collected analytics can dictate more stroke analysis and feedback.

 

Engineering Team

 

From the beginning, it has been our goal at Phlex to build a super team of engineering talent to develop the EDGE. We have crafted a team of engineers with swimming backgrounds to help shape this product following one simple goal; always keep the swimmer in mind. After many years of development, we are so excited to bring the EDGE, developed completely in the United States, to market.

 

Swimming Background

 

Founded by four teammates swimming for the University of Florida, the Phlex team is experienced in every segment of the sport of swimming. Co-founders of Phlex have extensive experience in the sport of swimming.

  • Marcin Cieslak is a 3x NCAA Champion and has competed at the 2012 Olympic Games for Poland
  • Harrison Gibson has decades of coaching and swimming experience at the club and collegiate level
  • Ryan Rosenbaum is a USMS national record holder and experienced open water swimmer
  • Luke Torres grew up as a club swimmer in Brazil, swam collegiately, and now competes in triathlons.

Through all of our time around the sport, we have cultivated relationships with Olympic team coaches and medalists, Iron Man triathletes, and Masters world record holders to understand what drives YOU as a swimmer.

story:
SAVING THE BRUMBLEY'S

My name is Tammy Swets and I'm going to tell you the story of a major battle my family has been going through for years. In 2008 Ralph Brumbley (my father) developed a big knot on his neck. At first we all figured it was just an infection. He took some antibiotics he had and the knot kept getting bigger. He made an appointment to find out what was causing this knot. Many scans and xrays were done and a day before Thanksgiving we recieved a phone call stating he had cancer of the throat. He went through numberous sessions of chemo and radiation and a surgery he only had a 5% chance of making it through. He had to have a feeding tube inserted into his stomach due to the radiation burning his mouth so badly it damaged saliva glands and caused major burns. His cancer has recently went into remission but sadly the battle isn't over. The radiation left him with a damaged mouth. His jaw bone was burned so much it crumbled. He has no saliva in his mouth because the glands were so destroyed that eating is impossible. However the feeding tube was removed and he now lives by trying his best to eat although the pain with trying to eat is severe. He is on several medications for pain and still we are treating scabs and burn wounds. He was told he needs a surgery to fix his jaw which consists of taking a piece of a bone from his hip. Again the chances of him making it out of the surgery are very slim and all the surgery will do is fix the bone in his jaw but will do nothing for his wounds in his mouth. Right now he is surving by drinking Osmolite 1.5 Cal. This use to be what he fed himself with through his feeding tube. Since he no longer has taste buds he drinks as much as he can to stay alive. Sadly since the feeding tube was removed the insurance no longer covers his Osmolite. Then when we though it couldn't get worse in September I recieved a call from my father stating I needed to come over quick. I rushed to my parents home. My mother had became very weak and her breasts were becoming deformed and bleeding. We rushed her to the local Emergency room to find out she needed to be admitted. The doctor came in and said that she has terminal breast cancer, diabetes, and a cist on her ovaries along with a cist on the outside of her leg. We were told she would not survive. The first question that came through my mothers mind wasn't about herself. She worried that my dad would forget all his appointments and the fight he fought so hard for to be there with her and to die with her. Right at that moment we all prayed. We refuse to give into this diagnoses. My mother had a biopsy done at the hospital and a port put in for chemo to start. The doctors lanced her leg and drained the cist she had and thankfully it was not cancerous. Both of my mothers breasts were found to be nothing but tumors there was no breast tissue left. We were then told after a scan was done that the cancer was pressing against her heart cavity and that she could possibly have a heart attack. The treatment given to her is not to save her. The chemo they used was only to shrink the cancer not to kill it. My mothers heart started to get weaker so the chemo had to be lessoned. The doctors then added to the list of diagnoses that she also has pulminary disease. The cancer is aggressive and my mother will be starting radiation in a week. She has several places around her heart that are severe and the doctors believe that if they do not radiate that the cancer will pass to the bone which will cause a horrible and painful death. Everything they are doing is to insure they make her death as painless and comfortable as possible. Yet we are praying for a miracle. My mother decided to stay home and raise us as we were growing up so we recently were told she could not recieve disability. She is falling through every loop hole there is when it comes to medicaid. We were told she can only receive medically needy. If you know anyone who has cancer or had you know that the costs of treatment are beyond what 1,400 a month can take care of. Keep in mind on that income they have a payment to make for their home, to feed themselves, to pay co-pays and to pay for treatments that medicare will not pay for such as bone density scans which we are told her bones are showing weakness.

What We Need & What You Get

We marked the goal for 5,000 because we know there are so many others in the same situation and we want everyone out there who needs a donation to get one. Right now the current medical bills are over 10,000 and growing. We are receiving threatening letters stating they will be put into collections and even some stating they will stop treatment. They really need your help. As for the perks we don't have a lot to give other thanks and appreciation and prayers. What we will do is keep you informed on treatments to show you what your donation help pay for. We will give you links to a facebook site to where you can follow us every step of the way. You will get a personal thanks from Janice and Ralph by email or mail. We will also send photos. On facebook we will be posting intimate photos of what our family is going through along with pictures of my fathers tumors, radiation photo's, surgery photo's. We will also be posting photos of my mothers port for her chemo and blood. Her leg but not alot having to do with her breasts since its personal. We will also be posting paperwork to give you proof of what your helping with. We know sometimes its hard to believe without seeing and we understand that. All these things will be on facebook for you to see.

The Impact

Basically a dollar helps loads. Your donation will help with medications that cost over 100's of dollars. We believe that even with the prognoses that there is hope and you may be part of a miracle of saving their lives. It will help with treatments they couldn't afford. It will insure she wont suffer a horrible death if that is the outcome. You will be helping provide a family with peace.

Other Ways You Can Help

For those that can not donate join us on facebook. You can send an email to Janicebrumbley@yahoo.com to receive the information on facebook and we will send you details so we can add you to the page. Pass us around to anyone and everyone. Send our link to the donation site. Pray for our family. Prayers are appreciated. Raise awareness for cancer of any type.

story:
Times are tough, and even those of us who seem to have everything together on the surface have struggles that we hide.  Even though I do have the means to live, I am faced with the difficulty of not being able to save for a rainy day... or a root canal (or in my case, two).  I humbly ask for your generous donations so that I can get the root canals I need, and repair the broken tooth that resulted from not being able to get the care I have needed for so long.

The basic dental insurance I have was able to cover cleaning and x-rays.  My dentist has referred me to a specialist to get two root canals, as he does not do them in his office.  The specialist I was referred to told me that each tooth costs $1,100 per tooth, out of pocket, and that they do not accept the insurance I have.  That is why I ask for $2,200 in donations.  I had another referral, which was a little more expensive, and also do not accept my insurance.

I hope that one day I am able to pay it forward and donate to all of the other incredible causes out there.  Until then, I will ask for you - kind friends, colleagues, and generous strangers - to help out one person who will someday put that kindness back out into the world.


Thank you!

story:
Friends and Family,

This summer I am going to be participating in a medical mission trip to El Salvador through my medical school.  Our team of medical students, doctors, and staff will be departing on July 13 and returning July 20, 2014.  I am writing this in hopes that you may be moved to sponsor me on my trip and help to deliver basic patient care, medical assistance, health education, clothing and food to those most in need. 

Many of those we will see are uninsured and are without ready access to health care.  Often, people living in these communities have to walk for several kilometers to catch a bus to the capital just for basic care.  Most homes consist of one to two rooms, house an average of six people, and lack appropriate water and sanitation services. With your support, I can help bring medical care to these wonderful people.

This trip will cost each medical student $1,500 to be able to go volunteer medical services and being that we are students, financial means are limited. This fact, however, does not limit our desire to be able to donate our services to those in need.

Thank you in advance for any amount of financial assistance you feel comfortable donating to my cause. 

Sincerely,

Meghan Greenfield

Osteopathic Medical Student I

story:
So three years ago my father almost died because he had an arteriovenous malformation (Brain AVM) that exploded in his head.  Because of some amazing doctors at the University of Wisconsin-Madison the saved him and he is doing ok now.   They did mention that this is a condition that is hereditary.   So last year I was having headache issues and the doctor could not find a reason and after few weeks they suggested that I get an MRI.   I had asked the doctors/schedulers how much out of pocket this is going to cost and no one could tell me.   The final bill which was my part was around $2000 when all was said and done.  I called and spoke to the Aurora Medical at Summit to make payment arrangements and they could only do a 12 month payment plan which I could not afford so I was sending them $25 a month.   This was not enough so they stopped sending me bills and now I am in collections.   I called and spoke to the collections agency to try to make payment arrangements that I could afford and they said they need the full payment or you have to go to court.   I then asked to change the court date because I will be out of town and as of now they will not do that either.    So here I am pretty much broke and living pay check to pay check and could probably make partial payments but no one will take that.   So heck I figured lets give this a try.    If for some reason this actually works and I get enough funding anything over will be donated to the University Of Wisconsin Hospital and clinics neurology department.    Thanks everyone!!!  


I just wanted to update everyone that I have closed this.  I should have read the fine print and realized I had to keep it open for 30 days.   I have contacted the appropriate people about the current funding.

story:
Over 1 maand stappen Thomas Schenk en ik in de auto voor de 7.000 kilometer lange Amsterdam-Dakar Challenge. In drie weken rijden wij door 8 landen, dwars door de Westelijke Sahara en Mauritanië. We hopen zonder kleerscheuren, botbreuken of ontvoeringen te eindigen in de hoofdstad van Senegal. Van daar is het nog een laatste etappe naar Banjul, Gambia, waar onze auto op 28 november geveild zal worden. 

De volledige opbrengst van die veiling doneren we aan Tanka Tanka Hospital, een non-profit organisatie die het enige psychiatrische ziekenhuis in heel Gambia realiseert. De psychiatrie is nog steeds een achtergesteld gebied in Gambia en extra kennis, materialen en mensen zijn hard nodig om de psychiatrie te verbeteren en een gelijkwaardige plaats te geven binnen de gezondheidszorg. Meer info vind je op http://www.tankatanka.nl/.

Ons gehele team bestaat uit 2 auto’s en 4 motoren. Over onze monsterrit verschijnt een reportage in Nederlands mooiste mannenblad JFK en twee reportages in Motor Magazine. Via onze Facebookpagina houden we je op de hoogte van het wel en wee, de lol en het afzien, het zandhappen en het doorbijten.

Ik zou het leuk vinden als jij een steentje wilt bijdragen door een onderdeel(tje) van de auto of onze rit te sponsoren. Zoals gezegd gaat de volledige opbrengst van de auto naar Tanka Tanka. Alle kosten voor de trip nemen wij zelf voor eigen rekening. 

Iedere bijdrage wordt zeer gewaardeerd. En vergeet vooral niet de Facebookpagina te liken, dan blijf je altijd op de hoogte!

Ook zou ik het te gek vinden als je ons komt uitzwaaien, op 7 november op het NDSM-terrein in Amsterdam. Alvast bedankt voor je steun!

story:
The Read ‘n Style pen is the first digital pen beautifully designed to improve reading speed and comprehension, leaving a kid free to be a kid. Simply press the top mounted button and slide the device over the text. As it scans, the words will be read aloud in real time using a small, discreet Bluetooth earpiece.

 

 

Hidden Abilities, the startup company responsible for the Read 'n Style pen, is backed by the full support of  The KU Catalyst, the University of Kansas' student business accelerator. The Catalyst has been an invaluable resource for the team, providing office space, mentoring,  continuing education, professional contacts, and more.

 

 

 

 

The Read ‘n Style pen does more than just read text aloud for struggling readers, it helps kids learn to overcome obstacles on their own, boosting their self-confidence and making them more independent. Seeing the written words as they hear them pronounced has been shown to help students increase the size of their sight words, build their vocabulary, and improve their spelling.

By using the Read ‘n Style pen, your son or daughter will become more efficient, knocking out their schoolwork in a fraction of the time. And because the Read ‘n Style pen can’t store information, students can use it on tests with no risk of cheating.

The Read ‘n Style pen also helps students learn broad topics and concepts because it allows them to learn in a way that is better suited their learning style. That's important because the value of reading isn't the reading itself, but the ability to understand the information that is encoded in the text, and that's what makes the Read 'n Style pen such a powerful tool.

 

 

 

Anxiety free reading

Throughout a normal school day, many teachers give handouts that they expect their students to read. This can be a nightmare for those that struggle with slow reading speed. The Read ‘n Style pen can ease your student’s nerves, letting them calmly listen to the text as they follow along.

 

Knock out homework in minutes, not hours

An hour of homework easily turns into three for students with dyslexia. By allowing students to listen to the text as they follow along, the Read ‘n Style pen decreases homework time while increasing the amount of material students are able to digest and comprehend. 

 

Use the Read ‘n Style pen on tests with no risk of cheating

For many schools, the go-to “solution” for testing is to pull the student out of the classroom so the test can be read aloud without disturbing the other students. This can be humiliating for students who just want to fit in with their classmates. Because the Read ‘n Style pen can’t store information, students can use it on tests with no risk of cheating. This means your child will never again have to experience the pain and embarrassment of being pulled from the classroom.

 

Great for on the go students

People with dyslexia often have difficulty tracking words on the page. This problem is only made worse when you’re traveling in a vehicle. With the help of the Read ‘n Style pen, students can complete homework on the bus ride home or during a weekend trip

 

Put they joy back in reading

The Read ‘n Style pen brings stories to life. By reading text aloud, the Read ‘n Style pen helps struggling readers paint mental pictures, making reading enjoyable. From now on, accelerated reader points will be a breeze. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

For the millions of Americans who struggle with dyslexia, reading can be the single biggest obstacle to achievement. All too often students with dyslexia are pushed away, held back, and swept under the rug. That ends now. We’ve created the Read ‘n Style pen to give students the tools to succeed.

 

The idea for the Read ‘n Style pen began when Jamee was in elementary school. Like many others, she struggled with reading. When Jamee had homework, she went to her mom for help, and the two of them would sit at the kitchen table taking turns reading. Jamee would read a page out loud and her mom read the next to her. They would repeat this process back and forth until they were finished. When it was her mom’s turn to read, Jamee would follow along with her, reading the words on the page as her mom pronounced them out loud. Seeing the words, then listening to them pronounced helped Jamee understand what she was reading, improved her spelling, and built her vocabulary.

 

Flash forward to 2013; Jamee’s in college trying to read the “wall of text” her professor assigned. “There’s no way I’ll even be able to finish half of this!” Jamee thought to herself in frustration. “I wish there was a better way.” Suddenly, the memories of all those late nights and early mornings reading with her mom came back to her, and she thought, “What if I had a device that did just what mom had done?” Lightning flashed and thunder rumbled throughout the room. The Read ‘n Style pen was born. At least that’s how Jamee tells it.

 

 

 

 

 

"Proud Dyslexic" Tier

By backing our project at the “Proud Dyslexic” tier, you'll be among the first in the world to own a Read ‘n Style pen. As a reward for supporting our campaign you'll receive save $70 off the retail price. (MSRP: $396.99) By selecting this per you'll receive one Read 'n Style pen, one micro USB charger, and one set of Bluetooth earbuds.

 

"Proud Dyslexic Family" Tier

Dyslexia run in families so why not offer a bundle package at a special price. Back at the “Proud Dyslexic Family” tier and receive two Read ‘n Style pens, two micro USB chargers, and two sets of rechargeable Bluetooth earbuds for a combined $170 off the retail price. We'll even combine shipping.

 

"Honorary Dyslexic" Tier

These "Empowered By Dyslexia" T-shirts are conversation starters. Our mission, beyond the Read ‘n Style pen, is to create a change in the way society views dyslexia and to spark discussions about learning disorders in households around the world. Help us start that conversation by backing at the "Honorary Dyslexic" tier. That way you can start sporting these t-shirts, custom designed by Becky to help you spread awareness and create better public understanding.

Printed by Payden's former high school technology teacher and a group of his current students, RAIDER Ink, $1 from each transaction will go towards helping the student led charity, RAIDER relief. We'll be in touch after the campaign to get your size and color choice.

 

 

Since we began working on this three years ago, we’ve had a lot of ups and downs and false starts, but we’ve kept at it, always pushing forward. We’ve been incredibly fortunate in our pursuit of this, linking together with the just the right people at just the right time. It’s our great pleasure to introduce our team.

 

 

After more than 9 months of work, Shane completed the first working prototype of the read ‘n Style pen in April. From there we contacted several contract electronic development companies, looking for someone to help us design a custom printed circuit board assembly (PCBA) that fits our needs.

 

After shopping around and evaluating several different options we found a small company that has been in business since 1981, developing electronics mainly for the railroad and aviation industries. Their small size and personal feel is what attracted us to the company because they are able to give us the personalized attention we need.

 

We have been working with them on the Read ‘n Style pen since the middle of August and we should have an engineered prototype very soon. From there we will need to integrate the software we've been developing in house with the new PCBA, finish out the housing design, and decide on packaging. 

 

When all is said and done, we should be able to ship out the rewards by the end of February. But to be clear, we aren’t going to cut corners in order to meet that deadline. These things take time and sometimes stuff happens that we can’t foresee. Our promise to you is that we will make our best effort to complete the project on time so we can ship out the rewards by the end of February. If we can’t do that we'll be forward and honest about it, letting you guys know about it as soon as it becomes apparent that we won’t be able to make the deadline.

 

EDIT: We ran into a few issues in development that delayed the project. We've since gotten past the hurdles that slowed us down and should begin shipping orders by mid July if things continue to go as well as they have been lately. My sincerest apologies for the delay. 

 

 

We are asking for $40,000 so we can make our first production run. The money will be used to cover the one-time fixed development costs needed to produce the first unit, as well as the variable costs needed to manufacture each unit that is ordered through this campaign. For fixed costs, we will be using the capital raised for FCC certification testing, an injection mold to create the housing, transportation for our input material, a software development kit for the text-to-speech voice engine, and product liability insurance.


For variable costs, we’ll need to cover the cost of supplies and machine time for our first production run. This includes expenses like printed circuit board assemblies (PCBAs), injection molded housings, royalty payments for the text-to-speech engine, earbuds, packaging, and of course taxes.

 

 

Q1:    Which languages does it read?

A1:    Right now the Read ‘n Style only reads English. We have plans to expand into other languages after we are more established, but our primary focus is getting it working in English.

 

Q2:    We’ve used XYZ product before and the voices are so robotic sounding. How good are your voices?

A2:    Poor voice quality is something that Jamee has complained about since she started using her accommodations and she won't let us put out a product with poor voice quality. We've spent a considerable amount of time researching and evaluating nearly a dozen different text to speech engines and we’re very confident in our choice. If you’d like to sample the voices that we intend to use, you can do so here.

 

Q3:    Are you at all concerned about children using this INSTEAD of reading at all, and never developing their reading skills.

A3:    That’s a really good point. By no means is this meant to be a substitute for reading, just an aid to help students get through more material. The real value in reading, to us anyway, is not the reading itself, but the exposure to the ideas and concepts encoded in the text. If our invention is able to help a person achieve that, it has served its purpose.

 

Q4:    My kid has XYZ syndrome, do you think this device could help them?

A4:    You know your situation better than we do, but we think the Read ‘n Style pen will be able to help people with many different conditions, not just dyslexia. As long as the person in question has enough motor control to scan a line of text and is able to understand spoken English, there is a really good chance the Read ‘n Style pen can be an incredibly valuable tool for them.

 

Q5:     I already have a pair of Bluetooth earbuds that I like. Am I able to use those instead?

A5:     Yes you can! The Read 'n Style pen will work with most Bluetooth earbuds currently on the market.

 

Q6:     What material will the Read 'n Style be able to read?

A6:     As long as the material is not handwritten and the font size is smaller than 128pt, the Read 'n Style pen should be able to read it.

story:
Goes wherever you go.

Ellie is lightweight and portable enough to take anywhere so you’re never without a sterilized bottle, pacifier or teething ring.

 

Small enough to fit into a diaper bag, Ellie’s week-long battery life makes it the perfect sterilizing solution while on the go. It is also the perfect place to hygienically store your baby’s bottles and pacifiers. 

 

Works at the push of a button.

Simple-to-use, one-touch operation allows busy parents to sterilize any items that go into their babies’ mouths quickly and easily—even when their hands are full.

 

Eradicates the bad stuff quickly.

Ellie kills 99.9% of harmful germs and bacteria in just 60 seconds without the worry of boiling, steaming or harsh chemicals. The TRUVIOLET technology inside Ellie is 100% mercury free, non-toxic and robust.

 

 

 

If it fits inside, it's sterilized.

Ellie stays useful long after the infant and toddler stages. Continue to use it to sterilize exposed surfaces of everyday items:

  • Remote controls
  • ​Mobile phones
  • Toothbrushes
  • Combs & brushes
  • Keys & key fobs
  • Headphones/earbuds
  • Thermometers
  • Small toys
  • Kitchen utensils
  • Contact lenses
  • Mouth guards
  • Retainers
  • Dentures
  • Face masks/CPAP masks

 

Charges like a phone.

Forget about finding an outlet or replacing batteries. The battery inside Ellie is micro-USB rechargeable, safe for air travel, and good for at least one week when used up to 20 times a day.

 

The world is starting to take notice of the germ-killing power of digital UV light. 

 

Huffington Post: “Introducing the microchip of health.” Read more.

Lux Live: “The effectiveness of UV light at killing germs is becoming increasingly apparent.” Read more.

BizLED Magazine: “Exposure to UV LED deactivates bacteria significantly faster and more completely than today’s disinfection solutions.” Read more.

 

Ellie with TRUVIOLET is a breakthrough in sterilization technology. 

1. BPA-free, non-toxic plastic
2. UV-filtered viewing window 
3. Four TRUVIOLET digital UV light LED modules
4. Easy-to-clean, food-safe, aluminum-coated surfaces
5. Two-bottle capacity with electroplated rotatable shelf
6. Safety latch (Ellie won’t operate unless door is secure)

 

 

In addition to sterilizing bottles and more, Ellie can also purify water for mixing formula no matter where you are. 

 

 


The patents behind Ellie’s germ-killing power.
 

US Patent 8816300
Portable UV-LED water purification system

US Patent 8884258
Ultraviolet light source and methods

US Patent 8987755
Ultraviolet light emitting diode structures and methods of manufacturing the same

US Patent 9112103
Backside transparent substrate roughening for UV light emitting diode

US Patent 9219204
Semiconductor device and a method of making a semiconductor device

US Patent 9318652
Ultraviolet light emitting diode structures and methods of manufacturing the same

US Patent 9455300
Pixel array of ultraviolet light emitting devices

US Patent 9461198
Backside transparent substrate roughening for UV light emitting diode

US Patent 9468695
Ultraviolet light source and methods

 

Ellie is available in four colors: Stone Grey, Arctic Blue, Ultra Violet, and Pure White.

 

Forget about the hassle of boiling or the worry of melting or eroding bottles.

 

Put an end to the danger of burning your hands while steaming.

 

Wave goodbye to the concerns over BPAs leaching.

 

Toss out the harsh soaps and chemical cleansers that can erode or melt bottles and cause harm to parents’ hands and babies’ delicate systems.

 

Nothing compares to Ellie.

Say hello to Ellie with digital UV LED technology—the fastest, easiest and safest way to sterilize bottles, pacifiers and more. Everywhere.

 

Killing germs made easy.

 

 

 

The technology.

Ellie’s patented TRUVIOLET technology uses powerful UV light to safely kill 99.9% of viruses, bacteria and a wide range of microbes, including those that are antibiotic and chemical resistant. TRUVIOLET is the most advanced and effective UV LED technology developed to kill germs everywhere, including water, air and surfaces.

 

How is UV light successfully used for sterilizing?

David J. Weber, MD, MPH

Dr. Weber is a Professor of Medicine and Pediatrics at the University of North Carolina School of Medicine and a Professor of Epidemiology at the UNC Gillings School of Global Public Health. He also serves as the Medical Director of the Departments of Hospital Epidemiology (Infection Control) and Occupational Health, UNC Health Care. He is board-certified in internal medicine, infectious disease, critical care medicine, and preventive medicine.

 

It's a germ torture chamber.

4 total UV LED modules (2 top; 2 bottom) leaves nowhere for germs to hide.

 

TRUVIOLET: It's not just for babies.

 

Check back often to see the very latest Ellie perks. Limited quantities available.

 

As we hit our fundraising milestones, additional perks will continue to unlock.

 

An open letter from our founder.

 

Dear Friends,

Thank you for your support. It’s because of backers, friends and family like you that we’re able to launch our first product—Ellie—with TRUVIOLET™ technology inside.

And this is just the beginning of a larger dream: to use our advanced digital UV technology to keep babies and kids all across the world safer from harmful germs.

The fact that 3.4 million people, mostly children, die annually from water-related diseases is one of the driving forces behind our technology.

These illnesses and deaths are preventable.

By simply harnessing the power from the sun using solar cells, storing it in a battery and unleashing the germ-killing power of TRUVIOLET technology, we can create on demand, point-of-use water purification, especially in countries and rural regions without centralized water or electrical supply.

I’d like to take this opportunity to invite you to join our movement. Our launch is the last piece to complete this equation, so please help us get this technology to the people all over the globe who need it most.

Once again, I sincerely thank you for your continued support. Together we can use TRUVIOLET to save the lives of millions.

Warm regards,

Yitao Liao
Founder and Chief Innovation Officer, RayVio

 

 

Dr. Yitao Liao / Chief Innovation Officer

Dr. Liao is CIO of RayVio and also serves on its board of directors. Dr. Liao is responsible for driving overall strategy and development of RayVio’s business; with a particular focus on RayVio’s UV-LED healthcare and consumer products and partnerships. Dr. Liao co-developed RayVio’s core material technology at Boston University. He was formerly an epitaxial growth scientist at Philips Lumileds. He has a PhD in Electrical Engineering from Boston University.

 

Dr. Robert C. Walker / CEO

Dr. Walker is CEO of RayVio, serves on its board of directors and also speaks for the company’s mission at healthcare and consumer wellness events. Dr. Walker has 20 years of experience in the LED and compound semiconductor world, particularly in Asia, and 6 years of venture capital experience. He was formerly a Partner at Sierra Ventures and CEO of BridgeLux. He has a PhD in Physics from Caltech.

 

Dr. Doug Collins / CTO & VP of Engineering

Dr. Collins is responsible for all aspects of technology and technology development across RayVio. Dr. Collins has more than 20 years of experience in semiconductor device design and development, encompassing epitaxial materials growth, device fabrication, manufacturing, test and reliability. He held a variety of positions at EMCORE, including Principal Scientist, reporting to the CTO. He has a PhD in Physics from Caltech.

 

Matthew Loyd / Chief Marketing Officer

Mr. Loyd is responsible for all marketing materials related to the product launch of Ellie. He has over 15 years of brand marketing experience for companies such as Clif Bar, Method, Gap, Mosey and most recently, Misfit Wearables. In addition to his years spent in the business world, Mr. Loyd has recently received his MBA in Design Strategy from California College of the Arts in San Francisco.

FAQs
 

Are all bacteria bad?
Absolutely not. Many are beneficial to people and help us build healthy immune systems. But some germs are dangerous and life threatening—especially to babies and their underdeveloped immune systems. Most adults have fully developed immune systems, but babies and infants don’t and should have additional protection from potentially harmful germs. And now with Ellie, they do. 

Why not sterilize like my parents did?
The biggest risks are new and emerging viruses, like superbugs, that simply weren’t a threat to ours and previous generations. Superbugs are resistant to some or all of the most commonly used antibiotics. However, superbugs are fully susceptible to the TRUVIOLET™ UV light found in Ellie. Just 60 seconds in Ellie and superbugs are rendered completely harmless. So without muss or fuss, boiling water or steam, Ellie safely and quickly sterilizes in 60 seconds. And you can take it with you wherever you go.

What is TRUVIOLET?
TRUVIOLET is the most advanced and effective digital UV LED technology developed. TRUVIOLET is compact and powerful, fast and convenient, deadly to superbugs, and completely safe to use. Most existing UV solutions feature mercury lamps, which can easily break. TRUVIOLET, on the other hand, is a microchip. So Ellie is 100% mercury free and completely non-toxic. 

How does TRUVIOLET kill germs?
When germs are exposed to the ultraviolet light of TRUVIOLET, they absorb it and trigger a photochemical reaction that breaks their DNA. Once their DNA is destroyed, the germs can’t replicate and pose no threat to babies, infants, children, adults, or pets.

Aren’t we supposed to avoid UV light?
UV light occurs naturally; you’re exposed to it whenever you’re exposed to sunlight. While everyone needs some exposure to UV light to stay healthy, it’s also important to protect our skin and eyes from intense exposure. Ellie is designed so that neither caregiver nor baby is ever exposed to the UV light. It is 100% contained inside the case. When Ellie’s door is opened, the UV LEDs turn off. 

Where else is UV light used?
Ultraviolet light is widely used in hospitals to disinfect patient rooms where it eliminates bacteria and viruses like E. coli, Staph and other germs that can cause severe illness or death. It’s also used to fight superbugs such as MRSA that can’t be killed by traditional methods using chemicals or antibiotics. UV light is also used for skin therapy to combat diseases like psoriasis, eczema, rickets and jaundice. In every case, UV light has proven to be effective at disinfecting and sterilizing surfaces, air, water and objects to prevent disease and illness.

What infections does Ellie prevent?
Ellie helps prevent infections such as MRSA (which causes pneumonia, meningitis, and septicemia); E. coli (which causes diarrhea and septicemia); Pseudomonas aeruginosa (which causes diarrhea); and Salmonella (which causes fever, vomiting, diarrhea and nausea). 

How effective is Ellie?
Independent third party laboratories have tested the TRUVIOLET technology inside Ellie and confirm that it eradicates superbugs and more with 99.9% germicidal efficacy in just 60 seconds.

How do I use Ellie?
Simply place bottles, binkies, small toys and anything else that needs to be sterilized inside Ellie. Use a wet wipe or water to remove any dirt or milk on the objects. Put the bottle upside down with the opening facing the UV LED. Place the nipple on the middle shelf where UV LED light can get into both the exterior and interior surfaces. Rest pacifiers at the bottom, below the shelf next to the bottle. Close the door, making sure it’s locked, and press the button at the top. In 60 seconds, everything is sterilized. 

Does Ellie need batteries?
Ellie uses a rechargeable battery with micro-USB charging interface. It’s safe for air travel and good for at least one week when used up to twenty times a day.

Why is Ellie’s interior coated with aluminum?
Ellie's sterilization chamber is coated with highly reflective, food-safe aluminum material to help bounce the sterilizing UV light multiple times—and in numerous directions—back and forth inside the chamber. This helps expose the maximum surface area of the baby’s feeding products to the ultraviolet light. 

Is Ellie BPA free?
Yes, Ellie is made of high quality, BPA-free, food-grade plastics to ensure the highest quality, safety, and environmental responsibility.

Can Ellie sterilize breast pump accessories?
Ellie can be used to sterilize parts from common breast pumps, such as the cup, nipple shield, connector valves and milk bottle. Just place these parts inside Ellie and make sure they sit correctly above the UV LED lights to get maximum UV exposure. Again, please don't overfill the Ellie case chamber with too many parts at once.

Can Ellie purify water for formula?
Yes. Fill a bottle with water, place the bottle in Ellie without anything over the opening, and Ellie will simultaneously sterilize the bottle’s interior and purify the water inside.

What else can Ellie sterilize?
Ellie was designed for baby bottles and pacifiers,  and it’s also great for sterilizing exposed surfaces of other everyday items that can transmit germs, such as cell phones, tablets, TV remote controls, coffee mugs, key chains, toothbrushes, dentures, utensils, small toys, etc. But please remember not to overfill the Ellie case with too many items at once.

Is Ellie compatible with all baby bottles?
Ellie is compatible with most baby bottles on the market. To ensure best results, we recommend bottles made by the following brands: Philips Avent, NUK, and MAM. These bottles have simple designs and no complicated geometries inside the bottle. Ellie is compatible with Dr. Brown bottles, except for the anti-colic tube which is difficult for Ellie's UV LED light to get into. Please avoid putting elongated tubes inside Ellie for purpose of sterilizing their interiors.

Is Ellie waterproof?
Ellie is water resistant. It can be wiped with a wet cloth, but not washed against running water or put into a dishwasher.

How big is Ellie?
Ellie is 7.6 inches wide (193 mm), 9.33 inches tall (237 mm), and 3.7 inches deep (94 mm).

What is Ellie’s retail price?
$129.

story:
People start their day hearing a loved one’s voice, cooking to music they like, reading a book, and later falling asleep listening to nature sounds. When your day has Clair's clean air and sweet sounds, your day is perfect.

            

We announced the 3rd prototype of clair-S at the 2017 CES in Las Vegas. Many who visited our booth gave us compliments saying "it feels like I'm in rainforest", "it keeps me feeling refreshed", and "this could really help my sleep".

 

 

Sleep is how we recharge. Good sleep is crucial to improving brain function and preventing a host of health problems.  When we think of wellness, the three most important elements should be: diet, exercise, and sleep.

 

  • Many people don’t realize that the air we breathe while we sleep is also tremendously important, and can have a major impact on our sleep quality. There is evidence that the air quality you breathe at night, plays an important role in your sleep quality.  The Harvard School of Public Health published a study that found air pollution to significantly increases the risk of having poor sleep.

 

  • While air quality’s effect on sleep can often go unnoticed, noises are often the primary culprit for us waking up in the middle of the night. Although irritable noises like your neighbor’s barking dog or a partner’s snoring can keep you up at night, other soothing sounds like crashing waves or the soft hum of an air conditioner can lull you to sleep.  Certain sounds, including falling rain, can improve the actual quality of your sleep.

      

 

What if we developed an air purifier that helps you get a good night’s sleep? To do this, the device must both be quiet, and effectively provide purified air to breathe. To accomplish this, we developed our own proprietary air filtration technology named “e2f”.

 

  • clair-S is more than just a standard air purifier with a HEPA filter. Its patented e2f filter goes beyond standard HEPA filter requirements, to even capture particulate matter 0.1 micrometers in size.

       

  • The clair-S air purifier operates on the principle of attracting polarized air-borne contaminants to the filter with a penetrating high polymer synthetic resin film. Highly effective in asthma and allergy care, it is capable of eliminating not only ultra-fine dust (as small as 0.1µm) but also allergens, pollen, mold, cigarette smoke, exhaust gasses and other unwanted particulate matter.

 

  • Most personal air purifiers on the market are not designed to run continuously. Power consumption often ranges as high as 40W to 120W, making constant use impractical, and necessitating timers and noxious gas detectors which only add to the product’s price tag. However, Clair-S is designed to run continuously. Clair-S uses a maximum of 3 watts, costing you just a few cents a month, even as you enjoy its benefits continuously all day and night.

       

 

  • HEPA filter-based air purifiers require powerful fans to push air through a fine mesh to capture airborne particles. The finer the mesh, the more powerful a fan is needed. Clair-S works on completely different technology that efficiently captures airborne particles without needing a strong fan. Far less noise is generated.  Even on the highest settings, Clair air purifiers only maintain noise levels equal to a quiet library or a whisper in a quiet room.

       

 

 

You can control the Clair-S companion app by connecting through Bluetooth . Using the app, you can play natural sounds, white noise, and ambient music. This helps lull you into even deeper, more restful sleep. For fresh air and pleasant sleep, Clair S is the smart air purifier.

 

  • Mix different soothing sounds together, to create your own custom audio mixes for relaxation, sleep, or concentration with our easy-to-use mobile app.

  • Soothing sounds played through the equipped bluetooth speaker will bring positive therapeutic effects and deeper sleep, by masking unwanted frequencies with the sounds of nature, white noise, and soothing songs, promoting a more stable physical and mental state.

 
  • Record a lullaby with your own voice. Clair-S will sing your child to sleep.

 

  • Most people hate alarm clocks and are needlessly distressed by classic wake alarms. clair-S will pleasantly wake you each morning with a recording of the familiar voice of your loved one, your spouse, your kids, or even your own voice. You will start to love your mornings. The better you start your day, the better you’ll feel for the rest of the day.
 

  • Whatever music sources your Bluetooth enabled smart device can access, clair-S can play.

         

 

  • clair-S is simple and easy to Use for everyone.

 

  • Unlike HEPA filters, which must be replaced every few months due to unremovable dust accumulation, the e2f filter was designed for easy cleaning and replacement. The e2f filter lasts for a full 12 months, and cleaning is as simple as vacuuming the dust off the filter's top portion.(once every 3 months recommended)

Clair-S can be used almost anywhere, but the ideal locations are small-medium sized rooms. It can also be used in larger rooms, such as an open office space. As long as the Clair-S is positioned relatively close to you in your work space, the benefits of having a personal air purifier can still improve the air you breathe. We refer to this area as the Clair zone.

 

  • BEDROOM : The ideal placement of a Clair air purifier in the bedroom is right next to your bed. This ensures the air you breathe while your sleep is the first to be filtered.

 

  • OFFICE : If you’re in an office all day, having an air purifier next to you on your desk is the perfect location. It’s close and highly effective. With a large model, the side or in the corner is a suggested. But with a Clair air purifier, your desk is the ideal spot, and will enhance the overall appearance of your office area.

 

For the design elements we collaborated with The Korean Institute of Design Promotion. The process was highly collaborative with multiple conceptualizations, re-designs and testing before deciding upon a final design.
     

Clair received recognition for its outstanding design and was invited to the IF design exhibition in Hamburg. (June.13.2016 ~ July.18.2016)

 

After several modifications, we have finalized the industrial design of clair-S that is ready to go into mass production.

Since the 3rd prototype is ready, we have continued evaluating and improving its effectiveness. Before starting mass production we will continue working on optimization and mobile app development. Of course, safety testing and certification application are ongoing as well. 

     

 

               

 

Our team is comprised of talented and professional indoor air quality experts, engineers, and designers with enthusiasm for developing innovative products.

  

 

Please contact marketing@clair.kr with further questions or requests.

  • Warranty 

One year from the date of manufacturer produce. If a defect exists, at its option Clair will repair the product at no charge. Though, users are responsible  for the shipping cost. However, any breakdowns or not function properly caused by customer, costs will be collected from the users.

  • Filter replacement and Maintenance

Changing filters is breeze. The back casing is held on by magnets, so it pulls off without tools. Just vacuum the filter once a month to maintain efficiency and replace it once a year. Simple. (Do not clean with water.)

  • Purchasing additional filter

Replacement filter is available on the Indiegogo In-demand after funding.

  • Coverage area 

For the best performance, we recommend to use around 10~15m2 of rooms.

  • Bluetooth range 

Clair-S's Bluetooth range is up to 10m, depending on your surrounding environment.

  • Maximum volume 

Output sound : 99±2dB

  • Companion mobile application

After the Indiegogo funding, it can be downloaded from Google Play Store and Apple App Store. 

  • Pairing with Clair-S

When clair-S is disconnected from your mobile phone, please press the button about 5 seconds. You will hear the beep sound and be confirmed of the connection with Red-Blue flash.

 

We have developed various types of air cleaner for past years with our outstanding filter technology and put it in a market successfully, but still craved for better products with better qualities to users.

We started to analyze the conditions of indoor environment where people were mostly exposed in and their essential needs. And it came to the one conclusion that a lot of people are actually suffering from sleep disorder and we needed to do something about it. So, we decided to add another function to overcome this issue even though our product was doing its own job perfectly 24/7 nonstop. This is how Clair-S was created.

It was not easy to add the whole new technology to the original product, maintaining its basic features. We had to utilize the extra inner space just to add up the additional function as needed without disturbing the optimized air channel.

It was a very difficult work but our amazing engineers never gave up and finally made the stablized module by downsizing the newly added parts. Now, we are about to get into mass production and we need your help to launch Clair-S in the market with full of pride. With your precious supports, we would like to spread remarkable impacts on air purifier market. We know that you deserve to have a better air cleaner like Clair-S.
story_txt:
People start their day hearing a loved one’s voice, cooking to music they like, reading a book, and later falling asleep listening to nature sounds. When your day has Clair's clean air and sweet sounds, your day is perfect.            We announced the 3rd prototype of clair-S at the 2017 CES in Las Vegas. Many who visited our booth gave us compliments saying "it feels like I'm in rainforest", "it keeps me feeling refreshed", and "this could really help my sleep".  Sleep is how we recharge. Good sleep is crucial to improving brain function and preventing a host of health problems.  When we think of wellness, the three most important elements should be: diet, exercise, and sleep. Many people don’t realize that the air we breathe while we sleep is also tremendously important, and can have a major impact on our sleep quality. There is evidence that the air quality you breathe at night, plays an important role in your sleep quality.  The Harvard School of Public Health published a study that found air pollution to significantly increases the risk of having poor sleep. While air quality’s effect on sleep can often go unnoticed, noises are often the primary culprit for us waking up in the middle of the night. Although irritable noises like your neighbor’s barking dog or a partner’s snoring can keep you up at night, other soothing sounds like crashing waves or the soft hum of an air conditioner can lull you to sleep.  Certain sounds, including falling rain, can improve the actual quality of your sleep.       What if we developed an air purifier that helps you get a good night’s sleep? To do this, the device must both be quiet, and effectively provide purified air to breathe. To accomplish this, we developed our own proprietary air filtration technology named “e2f”. clair-S is more than just a standard air purifier with a HEPA filter. Its patented e2f filter goes beyond standard HEPA filter requirements, to even capture particulate matter 0.1 micrometers in size.       The clair-S air purifier operates on the principle of attracting polarized air-borne contaminants to the filter with a penetrating high polymer synthetic resin film. Highly effective in asthma and allergy care, it is capable of eliminating not only ultra-fine dust (as small as 0.1µm) but also allergens, pollen, mold, cigarette smoke, exhaust gasses and other unwanted particulate matter. Most personal air purifiers on the market are not designed to run continuously. Power consumption often ranges as high as 40W to 120W, making constant use impractical, and necessitating timers and noxious gas detectors which only add to the product’s price tag. However, Clair-S is designed to run continuously. Clair-S uses a maximum of 3 watts, costing you just a few cents a month, even as you enjoy its benefits continuously all day and night.        HEPA filter-based air purifiers require powerful fans to push air through a fine mesh to capture airborne particles. The finer the mesh, the more powerful a fan is needed. Clair-S works on completely different technology that efficiently captures airborne particles without needing a strong fan. Far less noise is generated.  Even on the highest settings, Clair air purifiers only maintain noise levels equal to a quiet library or a whisper in a quiet room.         You can control the Clair-S companion app by connecting through Bluetooth . Using the app, you can play natural sounds, white noise, and ambient music. This helps lull you into even deeper, more restful sleep. For fresh air and pleasant sleep, Clair S is the smart air purifier. Mix different soothing sounds together, to create your own custom audio mixes for relaxation, sleep, or concentration with our easy-to-use mobile app.Soothing sounds played through the equipped bluetooth speaker will bring positive therapeutic effects and deeper sleep, by masking unwanted frequencies with the sounds of nature, white noise, and soothing songs, promoting a more stable physical and mental state. Record a lullaby with your own voice. Clair-S will sing your child to sleep. Most people hate alarm clocks and are needlessly distressed by classic wake alarms. clair-S will pleasantly wake you each morning with a recording of the familiar voice of your loved one, your spouse, your kids, or even your own voice. You will start to love your mornings. The better you start your day, the better you’ll feel for the rest of the day. Whatever music sources your Bluetooth enabled smart device can access, clair-S can play.          clair-S is simple and easy to Use for everyone. Unlike HEPA filters, which must be replaced every few months due to unremovable dust accumulation, the e2f filter was designed for easy cleaning and replacement. The e2f filter lasts for a full 12 months, and cleaning is as simple as vacuuming the dust off the filter's top portion.(once every 3 months recommended)Clair-S can be used almost anywhere, but the ideal locations are small-medium sized rooms. It can also be used in larger rooms, such as an open office space. As long as the Clair-S is positioned relatively close to you in your work space, the benefits of having a personal air purifier can still improve the air you breathe. We refer to this area as the Clair zone. 
BEDROOM : The ideal placement of a Clair air purifier in the bedroom is right next to your bed. This ensures the air you breathe while your sleep is the first to be filtered. 
OFFICE : If you’re in an office all day, having an air purifier next to you on your desk is the perfect location. It’s close and highly effective. With a large model, the side or in the corner is a suggested. But with a Clair air purifier, your desk is the ideal spot, and will enhance the overall appearance of your office area. For the design elements we collaborated with The Korean Institute of Design Promotion. The process was highly collaborative with multiple conceptualizations, re-designs and testing before deciding upon a final design.     Clair received recognition for its outstanding design and was invited to the IF design exhibition in Hamburg. (June.13.2016 ~ July.18.2016) After several modifications, we have finalized the industrial design of clair-S that is ready to go into mass production.Since the 3rd prototype is ready, we have continued evaluating and improving its effectiveness. Before starting mass production we will continue working on optimization and mobile app development. Of course, safety testing and certification application are ongoing as well.                       Our team is comprised of talented and professional indoor air quality experts, engineers, and designers with enthusiasm for developing innovative products.   Please contact marketing@clair.kr with further questions or requests.Warranty One year from the date of manufacturer produce. If a defect exists, at its option Clair will repair the product at no charge. Though, users are responsible  for the shipping cost. However, any breakdowns or not function properly caused by customer, costs will be collected from the users.Filter replacement and MaintenanceChanging filters is breeze. The back casing is held on by magnets, so it pulls off without tools. Just vacuum the filter once a month to maintain efficiency and replace it once a year. Simple. (Do not clean with water.)Purchasing additional filterReplacement filter is available on the Indiegogo In-demand after funding.Coverage area For the best performance, we recommend to use around 10~15m2 of rooms.Bluetooth range Clair-S's Bluetooth range is up to 10m, depending on your surrounding environment.Maximum volume Output sound : 99±2dBCompanion mobile applicationAfter the Indiegogo funding, it can be downloaded from Google Play Store and Apple App Store. Pairing with Clair-SWhen clair-S is disconnected from your mobile phone, please press the button about 5 seconds.
