story:
Short Summary

Jen is no longer able to drive her vehicle.  Her muscles have deteriorated to the point that she is unable to lift her legs into her car.  The state of AZ will put a ramp in her vehicle which will allow her to drive by using her wheelchair with joy sticks, BUT…  Jen's car is too old, so the state won't install the ramp and make the modifications to her vehicle.  

She needs to purchase a newer vehicle, and has a long way to go (about $8000) even after she trades in her 10 year old car, but this money will help get her there.   

Jen has a sparkle and way of making me want to be a better person.  My first image of her was jetting through the football field on her scooter (our sons have played together for 10 years now), bouncing in the potholes, smiling and laughing in the sun.  She was happy, in the face of not even being able to walk to see her son play football.  I was grumpy for some unmemorable reason, but my mood changed upon meeting Jen.  She is a light and an inspiration to all who are lucky enough to know her.  Her husband is a high school teacher (God bless him ;) she is a Realtor and transaction coordinator for a real estate team.

This vehicle modification will allow Jen to gain back her independence so her light can shine on all those who are lucky enough to cross her path. Thanks for your generosity in advance and Happy Holidays!

Her message is below:

"Hello! My name is Jen and I have Limb Girdle Muscular Dystrophy. I believe nothing is impossible and I have never let my MD stop me from living my life to the fullest. I've earned my bachelor's degree in Business Management, have an amazing son and husband and have even been skydiving when others said I couldn't. There are challenges for everyone in life, but I say for every problem there is a solution. I have not been able to drive independently for some time now and I've decided to change that! This fundraiser has been set up for me to raise money towards purchasing a new vehicle that will be completely modified with handicap accessibility features. The new vehicle will allow me to drive from my power wheelchair safely, get to and from work and come and go as I please - what a blessing that will be! I'm 36 years old and have dealt with MD since my teen years. I've got a lot of life yet to live and with your help, I am creating new possibilities in my life. I will be driving to independence with the new vehicle! Every bit of donation will count and will allow me to purchase the new vehicle. Thank you for taking time to hear my story :)"

story:
Welcome, and thank you for visiting my Indiegogo page. I am embarking on my dream of sharing yoga where it will have a tremendous impact on the well-being of children. I will spend one month this spring collaborating with local yoga teachers and organizations to promote mind-body programs. My goal is to offer yoga as a form of mind-body healing and to support local organizations in building viable yoga-based programs. I will spend time in Jordan and Turkey and will volunteer to: (1) instruct yoga for children and youth in health and community centres; and (2) facilitate pediatric yoga therapy training programs for local yoga teachers and health professionals.

Your support will be instrumental in allowing me to create and deliver the best training resources possible in order to share yoga where it will have a significant impact. Below are details about the mission. You can follow progress on my blog.

Why Yoga?

Palestinian and Syrian children are exposed to regular violence such as military operations. As a result, an alarming percentage experience post-traumatic stress symptoms such as problems sleeping, a constant feeling of anxiety and insecurity, and difficulty concentrating in school. On top of this reality, and close to my heart, a handful of children are also battling cancer and suffering from treatment-related side effects such as extreme fatigue and muscular deconditioning.

Yoga is a mindful activity that supports the interrelated physical, social, and emotional needs of children. Yoga practices tailored to their needs will provide these children with an opportunity to experience relaxation and a sense of peace within themselves. Also, through yoga, children can learn tools to identify and regulate their feelings, such as breathing practices to help them calm down if they feel anxious.

Local health and community organizations are eager to develop therapeutic mindfulness and relaxation programs that promote healing and resiliency. Based on a preliminary yoga-teaching visit last summer, I was invited to return and help build yoga-based programs at community centers, including the Huda Al Masri Childhood Cancer Centre (see my blog on the experience from last summer's visit). Syrian civil society organizations are eager to support their human rights advocates. Yoga is a unique program that can support the courageous, inspiring work of local organizations. 

Resources Needed

One of the advantages of yoga is that it is a low-cost intervention since minimal equipment is needed. I will volunteer my time to teach yoga, create materials, and facilitate trainings.  Local collaborators will assist with translating materials into Arabic. Still, there are basic expenses for this project and your support will ensure it is feasible:

 * Travel to and within Jordan and Turkey, lodging, communications, visas

 * Travel for Palestinian yoga teachers from Bethlehem to visit Amman for training programs 

* Honorarium for a photographer to take photos in order to create yoga materials for children (for example, handouts with breathing exercises they can practice at home before bed)

  * Printing yoga handouts for participants and training materials for teachers

While yoga mats and props are nice to have, they are not included due to the project’s goal of reaching a large number of participants. In fact, in India, children’s yoga classes are generally taught without any mats or props. For children with limited mobility or who may be ill, we will adapt yoga poses by using chairs or other readily available props such as pillows. 

I have set a fundraising goal of $2,000, which is lower than the actual cost in order to lessen the fundraising pressure since this is my first “fixed funding” (i.e. all or nothing) campaign. Any extra funds will enable me to print more copies of materials or purchase basic yoga props/resources.

When you join my community of supporters, I will add you to my email list for regular updates. You have the option to give any amount and anonymously. All amounts make a significant contribution (and fuel the project’s energy!). Please refer to Indiegogo's page for details on giving anonymously.

The Impact

Your support will make a tremendous difference in the daily lives of children in the Middle East. Your help will ensure that:

* Children participate in fun, nurturing yoga classes and learn tools that strengthen their resiliency

* Yoga teachers and health workers gain new skills to promote children’s wellness

* Yoga resources are free and accessible to community centers and clinics

Ultimately, this project is building a foundation for community-based yoga and other mindfulness-based programs that will support children in healing the wounds of war. Yoga provides a holistic and cost-effective approach to the physical, mental, emotional, and spiritual needs of children. 

Risks and Challenges

As with all projects in the region, yoga classes and trainings could be delayed or challenged by political situations. This is why flexible support from this campaign is critical! It enables yoga teachers to move the location of a training or class as necessary. In the end, passionate teachers will always find creative solutions to promote peace and healing. 

Thank you! 

I am grateful for your support – and look forward to sharing inspiring updates with you from Bethlehem! Be sure to follow my Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram accounts for news. You can read more about my yoga training and experience under the Campaign Team or on my website.

story:
Build A Robot. Fight Malaria. Save Lives!





Wired - The Next Big Thing You Missed: This Mosquito-Dissecting, Malaria-Killing Robot Needs Your Help

New York Times - A Goal to Combat Malaria With the Help of a Robot

Boston Globe - Robot May Help Fight Malaria

Daily Beast - The Robot That Could Kill Malaria

Science - Wanted - A Bug Spit Robot

Tech Republic - How a Crowd Funded Robot Could Finally End Malaria

Global Dispatch - Crowdfunding to Combat Malaria

International Business Times - Robot Combats Malaria with World's First Vaccine

Bioresearch Online - Biotech Form Aims to Automate Malaria Vaccine Production

The Register - Malarial Vaccine Firm Seeks Crowdfunding for Robo-Saliva Surgeon

Bostinno - DC Based IndieGoGo Campaign Calls Upon Harvard Robotics Team to Help Cure Malaria



SANARIA is a biotechnology company located in Rockville, Maryland, USA. Sanaria has developed a malaria vaccine that protects against the Plasmodium falciparum parasite, responsible for more than 98% of malaria associated deaths world-wide.

Until now no vaccine has ever fully protected people against the malaria parasite. Sanaria’s PfSPZ Vaccine now shows real promise in meeting that standard. In August 2013 Sanaria published groundbreaking clinical trial results: In the group that received the highest dose, PfSPZ Vaccine was 100% protective against malaria. See the results published in Science magazine here. 

As a result we received extensive press coverage for this groundbreaking achievement. Read the New York Times article on SporoBot™ here.



Currently we do a key step of the vaccine manufacturing process by hand. To reduce the cost of the vaccine and scale up production, we need to automate this key step.

All funds received from the campaign will be directly used to develop and implement SporoBot™. SporoBot™ will automate a key component of the manufacturing process, facilitating inexpensive mass production of the critically needed malaria vaccine.

 



We've built the parts, we've demonstrated they work, now we need to assemble SporoBot™ into a working prototype. And for this, we need your help.


With SporoBot™, Sanaria’s PfSPZ Vaccine can be made accessible to the millions of people most at risk. Please help protect these people to prevent the more than 200 million cases and more than 600,000 deaths caused by malaria every year. 


Worldwide Need


AUTOMATION DEVELOPMENT
Sanaria’s PfSPZ Vaccine is made from living, weakened malaria parasites (called sporozoites) that trigger protective immunity without causing disease. The sporozoites are produced in mosquitoes, and become concentrated in the insects' salivary glands. To make the vaccine, Sanaria’s mosquito dissectors remove the heads of mosquitoes and extract their salivary glands. Currently, we do this by hand dissection, but to produce the quantities of vaccine needed to treat hundreds of millions of people as quickly and as inexpensively as possible, we want to automate this process. Our plan is to develop a robot we call SporoBot™ and use it in performing this crucial step in vaccine production. As a result, we will increase manufacturing efficiency and decrease costs. With your help we can and will do both.

RAPID PRODUCTION
We estimate one SporoBot™ will be able to produce vaccine at 20 - 30 times our current efficiency. While we go forward using the current manufacturing process, SporoBot™ will enable greater productivity and will permit a more rapid production and deployment of greater quantities of the vaccine. Greater abundance and faster deployment of the vaccine will push forward the eventual elimination of malaria and the immeasurable improvement in the lives of billions of people now living under the threat of this disease.


Who We Are


In 2003, Dr. Stephen Hoffman and Dr. Kim Lee Sim started Sanaria at the kitchen table of their home. Nearly 50 scientists, researchers, and innovators have joined the Sanaria team. With grant funding from the National Institutes of Health and the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, we built our clinical manufacturing facility and our insectory in Rockville, Maryland. 


Why Crowdfunding?

Grants and Awards from the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, the National Institutes of Health, the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation through the PATH Malaria Vaccine Initiative, and the US Department of Defense and others have supported Sanaria since its founding in 2003. The recent government sequester reduced our access to funds that would have otherwise been available for projects such as SporoBot™. Grants from private and public institutions continue to support our ongoing research and clinical trials at home and overseas in Africa and Europe. But the processes in place to seek multi-million dollar grants to fund new projects, such as SporoBot™, can take years to process, and they are not guaranteed. Just last year, a grant for SporoBot was denied due to the government sequester. We at Sanaria feel a strong sense of urgency, and after years of progress, our goal of elimination is in sight. We could wait until public funding and economic conditions improve, but waiting comes at the cost of  thousands of lives. 

Every 60 seconds someone dies from malaria, usually an infant or child. Waiting is not an option for us. This is why we invite you to contribute to the creation of SporoBot™. All funds received from the campaign will be dedicated to completing SporoBot™. If everyone gives a little to reach our goal, we are that much closer to saving millions of lives.

Why partner with us?


ELIMINATE MALARIA: In 1977, a vaccine led to the eradication of smallpox from the world. In 1988, two vaccines were deployed to facilitate the elimination of polio, which should be eradicated in the next few years. Today, vaccines have led to near-elimination of other diseases such as tetanus and measles. Let's make malaria next. 

ELIMINATE SUFFERING: What movement is more worthwhile or inspiring than taking part in the permanent alleviation of suffering and death from a terrible disease?

IMPACT SCIENCE: Advance science with us as we change the face of medicine, bio-engineering, and public health.

MAKE HISTORY: Help eliminate a disease that has been one of the world’s biggest killers.


Please join us


Support the movement by making your contribution to our campaign and share the story. Your contribution can be any amount you choose, and is not restricted to the specific perk levels we have built. This is a new opportunity to affect real, historic change of unprecedented magnitude.

Most importantly, if we succeed in this campaign and develop SporoBot™, your contribution could impact hundreds of millions of people. You will be recognized as someone who has made a lasting positive change in the world.

Visit our website to learn more about our team and get involved!

Bostinno - DC Based IndieGoGo Campaign Calls Upon Harvard Robotics Team to Help Cure MalariaSANARIA is a biotechnology company located in Rockville, Maryland, USA. Sanaria has developed a malaria vaccine that protects against the Plasmodium falciparum parasite, responsible for more than 98% of malaria associated deaths world-wide.Until now no vaccine has ever fully protected people against the malaria parasite. Sanaria’s PfSPZ Vaccine now shows real promise in meeting that standard. In August 2013 Sanaria published groundbreaking clinical trial results: In the group that received the highest dose, PfSPZ Vaccine was 100% protective against malaria. See the results published in Science magazine here. As a result we received extensive press coverage for this groundbreaking achievement. Read the New York Times article on SporoBot™ here.Currently we do a key step of the vaccine manufacturing process by hand. To reduce the cost of the vaccine and scale up production, we need to automate this key step.All funds received from the campaign will be directly used to develop and implement SporoBot™. SporoBot™ will automate a key component of the manufacturing process, facilitating inexpensive mass production of the critically needed malaria vaccine. We've built the parts, we've demonstrated they work, now we need to assemble SporoBot™ into a working prototype. And for this, we need your help.With SporoBot™, Sanaria’s PfSPZ Vaccine can be made accessible to the millions of people most at risk. Please help protect these people to prevent the more than 200 million cases and more than 600,000 deaths caused by malaria every year. Worldwide NeedAUTOMATION DEVELOPMENTSanaria’s PfSPZ Vaccine is made from living, weakened malaria parasites (called sporozoites) that trigger protective immunity without causing disease. The sporozoites are produced in mosquitoes, and become concentrated in the insects' salivary glands. To make the vaccine, Sanaria’s mosquito dissectors remove the heads of mosquitoes and extract their salivary glands. Currently, we do this by hand dissection, but to produce the quantities of vaccine needed to treat hundreds of millions of people as quickly and as inexpensively as possible, we want to automate this process. Our plan is to develop a robot we call SporoBot™ and use it in performing this crucial step in vaccine production. As a result, we will increase manufacturing efficiency and decrease costs. With your help we can and will do both.RAPID PRODUCTIONWe estimate one SporoBot™ will be able to produce vaccine at 20 - 30 times our current efficiency. While we go forward using the current manufacturing process, SporoBot™ will enable greater productivity and will permit a more rapid production and deployment of greater quantities of the vaccine. Greater abundance and faster deployment of the vaccine will push forward the eventual elimination of malaria and the immeasurable improvement in the lives of billions of people now living under the threat of this disease.Who We AreIn 2003, Dr. Stephen Hoffman and Dr. Kim Lee Sim started Sanaria at the kitchen table of their home. Nearly 50 scientists, researchers, and innovators have joined the Sanaria team. With grant funding from the National Institutes of Health and the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, we built our clinical manufacturing facility and our insectory in Rockville, Maryland. Why Crowdfunding?Grants and Awards from the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, the National Institutes of Health, the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation through the PATH Malaria Vaccine Initiative, and the US Department of Defense and others have supported Sanaria since its founding in 2003. The recent government sequester reduced our access to funds that would have otherwise been available for projects such as SporoBot™. Grants from private and public institutions continue to support our ongoing research and clinical trials at home and overseas in Africa and Europe. But the processes in place to seek multi-million dollar grants to fund new projects, such as SporoBot™, can take years to process, and they are not guaranteed. Just last year, a grant for SporoBot was denied due to the government sequester. We at Sanaria feel a strong sense of urgency, and after years of progress, our goal of elimination is in sight. We could wait until public funding and economic conditions improve, but waiting comes at the cost of  thousands of lives. Every 60 seconds someone dies from malaria, usually an infant or child. Waiting is not an option for us. This is why we invite you to contribute to the creation of SporoBot™. All funds received from the campaign will be dedicated to completing SporoBot™. If everyone gives a little to reach our goal, we are that much closer to saving millions of lives.Why partner with us?ELIMINATE MALARIA: In 1977, a vaccine led to the eradication of smallpox from the world. In 1988, two vaccines were deployed to facilitate the elimination of polio, which should be eradicated in the next few years. Today, vaccines have led to near-elimination of other diseases such as tetanus and measles. Let's make malaria next. ELIMINATE SUFFERING: What movement is more worthwhile or inspiring than taking part in the permanent alleviation of suffering and death from a terrible disease?IMPACT SCIENCE: Advance science with us as we change the face of medicine, bio-engineering, and public health.MAKE HISTORY: Help eliminate a disease that has been one of the world’s biggest killers.Please join usSupport the movement by making your contribution to our campaign and share the story. Your contribution can be any amount you choose, and is not restricted to the specific perk levels we have built. This is a new opportunity to affect real, historic change of unprecedented magnitude.Most importantly, if we succeed in this campaign and develop SporoBot™, your contribution could impact hundreds of millions of people. You will be recognized as someone who has made a lasting positive change in the world.Visit our website to learn more about our team and get involved!

story:
Imagine...

Imagine birth of your own child, this sacred moment. Can you feel your heart? Full of love, joy, strength, excitement, all at once. Can you imagine that you trust Life, that you trust Nature, and follow your wisdom, whether you are the one who is giving birth, or the one supporting your women. Can you see people around you? They are calm and supportive. They embrace birthing mum, so that she can be in tune with herself and her baby. In this peaceful atmosphere everybody knows what to do and what is needed at that very moment. And your baby can feel wanted and welcomed in this world, in your family. Gentle and loving hands, kisses, mums heartbeat, a beautiful beginning...

I wish all of us could experience such a blissful birth.


Our Story

Hello, my name is Kasia Slazak and birth is my passion.

I work as doula, which means that I help people to prepare for birth on emotional, physical and spiritual level. I assist during the labour and I can help afterwords, too. It is amazing for me to see how people change. They grow and become stronger on their journey into parenthood, they come to be more confident in caring for this little new being, their baby.

For me Life is about this moment, and I believe that Ceremonies help us being present and make Life more enjoyable. This is why I offer Ceremonies during the pregnancy and after birth. And touch, it is so important for humans. I love it, so yes, I teach Baby massage and I offer pregnancy massage to mums, so that they can be more relaxed and enjoy their pregnancy. I am also active in many other ways connected to birth. You can read about who I am and what I do on this website: www.smileysoul.co.uk


The impact

I believe that the way we arrive to this world has a significant impact on the quality of our lives. This is why I promote natural and conscious birth.

Birth is life changing. I feel that trusting Nature and wisdom of the body can make it an empowering experience. With Nature on our side giving birth can be so much easier.

There is birth center in Bali where they believe in the power of Nature and help women and babies to experience birth as an empowering moment. I really wanted to go there and learn from them directly, because they approach the miracle of birth with trust and humility. I applied for a place on midwifery training/volunteer program and I got accepted. I wanted to bring this knowledge back with me and share it with our community. I started this fundraising page to collect money towards this training/volunteer project. Few days ago I received a message that due to unforeseen circumstances my training was cancelled and the whole program is suspended until further notice. It was a big shock for me and I admit at first I felt so disappointed and vulnerable.

I quickly realised I don't want to give up and I decided to go anyway, despite uncertainty, obstacles and all challenges lying ahead of me right now. My dream hasn't changed and my intention of enriching my experience and knowledge about birth and sharing it with our community hasn't changed either. However, now I will do it on my own. I have already started searching for people and places, where I can learn (found one more birth centre). Right now I need even more trust and faith that everything is just the way it supposed to be and I will find there what I desire and need. 


What we need

I will probably need less money now, but there is no option of changing the goal on this site. Whatever money I'll have left at the end of my stay in Bali I promise to give to local people.

I have amazing friends who believe in me so much, that they encouraged me to go there despite the cancellation of the program, they continue to support me trough their work and perks offered. 


How you can help

If any of this resonates with you, please feel free to help either by donating or spreading the word. Please let your friends know about it, let them know you support it. Put this information on your Facebook wall - we will greatly appreciate it. We will also appreciate the loving support of your heart :)

I started to learn Indonesian, and in their language thank you means:

'I receive your Love',  Thank you everyone:  Terima Kasih


With Love and Gratitude, 

Kasia and Friends


Where the money goes

- flights: £ 754

- accommodation: I'm planing to find people who could put me up and I might  occasionally stay at a hostel - 

- notary fee: £70

- visa fee: £70 (due to change of circumstances I need I had to apply for visa again)

- insurance: £51

- food: £540 (estimated)

- transport and other necessary expenses: £250

story:
Rush Limbaugh said that if health care reform were to pass in the U.S., he would move to Costa Rica. 

To celebrate the Supreme Court's decision to uphold Obamacare, let's pitch in to buy Rush a one-way ticket and bid him adieu!

What We Need

The cost of a one-way flight on from West Palm Beach to Costa Rica on Lacsa Airlines is $648. With your help, we can reach this modest goal.

What if Limbaugh Has Changed His Mind?

In the unlikely event that Limbaugh gets cold feet, we will give 100% of the money you contribute to Planned Parenthood. So please donate generously!

----

Caricature of Rush Limbaugh by DonkeyHotey on Flickr. Used under a Creative Commons license.

story:
My name is Mary and although I now call Toronto home, for most of my childhood I enjoyed living in Madeira Island Portugal. It was a beautiful place with friendly people and a great climate year round. Today the island is a well known tourist destination with its semi-tropical climate, beautiful landscapes and world renowned Madeira wine.

Unfortunately on July 18, 2012 fire broke out in various wooded areas in the higher elevations of the island. An unfortunate combination of lack of rain, temperatures in the mid 30’s to low 40’s and high winds quickly spread the out-of-control fires to residential areas. The island did not have enough firefighters to accommodate the multitude of fires in the different regions. People did their best to protect their properties with garden hoses and buckets, however, water being in such demand; many were left with dry tanks and no means of protecting themselves and their properties from the fires. Some recount how the fires leapt from one area to another quickly surrounding them in a matter of minutes. Many were evacuated from their homes taking nothing with them, only to return to burnt rubble and ashes where once their most prized possession, their homes, had stood. To add to this tragedy, most do not have property insurance, so there is no claim to be made or chance of recovery of their losses.

The once beautiful lush green countryside is now, in large areas of the island, scorched and gray. Gone are some of the beautiful banana plantations and vineyards.

Many animals perished – from pets to livestock – and of the livestock that did survive the farmer now has the dilemma of how to feed these animals that once grazed on the abundant greens of the countryside.

The current surreal grey environment will have a major impact on its vital Tourism industry. As for government assistance, from what I have seen on Portuguese television, folks aren’t optimistic to say the least. As we all know the current economic situation in Europe is difficult and this too will have an impact in the help provided to those affected.

The people of Madeira need your help. For the many who lost their homes, possessions, farms, livestock and pets, for those who suffered damage to their property and now have no means of making the necessary repairs – you can help! Every dollar collected will go directly to those affected.

Unfortunately I cannot provide charitable donation receipts, this is not a registered charity, merely a former Madeirense who never forgot her roots and truly feels for those back home. This is my way of reaching out and hopefully making a difference, but I can’t do it without you, so please help this worthy cause because together we can make a difference.

How to Help

Make a donation. Tell your friends about this situation and ask them to donate. Spread the word. “Like” us on Facebook! Tweet about it!

Thank you for your support. Obrigada!

story:
Short Summary

Virility Vitamin is the flagship product of Virility Labs, LLC. We are a new, ambitious health supplement company devoted to self-improvement and betterment. 

In response to the dangerously decreasing average levels of testosterone in men, (contributing to obesity, depression, sexual inability, etc.) we have created the world's best male sexual health supplement.

Ingredients included in Virility Vitamin have been scientifically proven to provide:

  • increased rigidity of erections
  • increased duration of erections
  • delayed ejaculation
  • increased intensity of ejaculation
  • increased volume of ejaculate
  • decrease length of refractory period
In addition to these benefits, a healthier hormonal balance and higher testosterone will improve psychological health as well increase effectiveness of diet and exercise.

The Brodyssey

To celebrate the launch of Virility Vitamin and the IndieGoGo campaign, Virility Labs is launching the world's first official Bro-Odyssey, an exhaustive 30 day self-improvement journey. The program will be updated live daily via blogspot, and video journals will be uploaded biweekly to the Virility Labs YouTube channel.

The Brodyssey includes programs and supplements from sources such as: Jamie Lewis at Chaos and Pain, Roosh V from Return of Kings, Rob Regish and all the guys at Mass Pro, Bryan Haycock from Think Muscle, Timothy Ferris from 4-Hour Work Week and many more.

For updates, check out:

www.theofficialbrodyssey.blogspot.com

What We Need & What You Get

Our funding goal is $50,000.00 USD. 

This will fund the procurement of supplies, necessary testing, encapsulation, bottling, labeling, and shipping of the first batch of Virility Vitamin, as well as an initial wave of marketing presence establishment. 

Any additional funding over our goal will be directly routed to Research & Development to conduct testing on 9-Hydroxycanthin-6-One, a b-carboline alkaloid isolated from the plant E.longifolia, shown in a promising study to promote penile erection and delay ejaculation by 400%

If our funding goal is met, we will have the first batch of Virility Vitamin shipping out within 1-3 months of the completion of the campaign.

Within 3-6 months, increase production levels of VV.

Within 6-12 months, begin R&D for 9H6One.

Within 12-18 months, develop a supplement utilizing 9H6One.

The Impact

What makes VV different from other similar male sexual health supplements?

Made in America - Virility Labs, LLC is proud to source all of its products from reputable American suppliers, and are subject to extensive quality and safety testing.

  • High and Consistent Concentration of Active Components - VV contains ingredients that have high concentrations of phytonutrients.
  • HPLC tested - All VV ingredients are tested by High-Performance Liquid Chromatography, one of the most accurate tests for measuring the level of active ingredients in supplements. You can be certain the advertised quantity is correct.
  • Toxicity tested.
  • Phytosome utilization - A complex of a natural active ingredient and a phospholipid, phytosomes increase absorption of herbal extracts, consequently, the active ingredients in VV are enhanced for better absorption.
  • High dosage  - Many supplement companies sell potentially beneficial products in quantities and doses too small to be effective. VV  contains more than the minimum effective dose of each active nutrient, only possible through the usage of:
  • Micronization - This technology makes particles smaller, thus allowing more ingredients to fit into a smaller space. You will not have to swallow a large number of pills to get an effective dose.
  • Absorption Enhancers - Apart from the phytosomes and micronization, additional absorption enhancers are included in VV, bioperene and astragin, which together boost the absorption of the active ingredients another 100%, increasing the already impressive potency of the vitamin.
Why do you need Virility Vitamin?

Studies indicate that the average level of testosterone in men has decreased every generation for over one hundred years. Cell phone radiation, estrogen contamination in food and water, un-athletic, sedentary lifestyles, and unhealthy, fattening food all contribute to the negative trend.

Estrogen, although necessary even in the male body in small amounts, wreaks havoc on a man's body in concentrations any higher than necessary.

Other contaminants that are not necessarily estrogen still cause a decrease in testosterone levels, such as cell phone radiation.

In addition, the male body did not evolve to sit in a desk all day, eating french fries and be drained psychologically by the rigors of the modern workforce. 

It appears as though a perfect storm of factors has amassed to lower healthy male hormone levels, thus stealing a man's health and zest for life.

This is causing a gradual decrease in masculinity over time, more difficulty building muscle, less clear thinking, less ability to stabilize positive moods, more storage of body fat and many other effects.

One of the most drastic changes has been the deterioration of man's sexual capacity. Studies show that up to 78% of people that are married or are in a long-term, monogamous relationship are dissatisfied with their sex lives. Erectile dysfunction is at an all-time high; premature ejaculation is much more common that it should be. 

Even if you believe yourself to be already healthy and virile, you will still notice a powerful, positive effect upon taking VV. 

This vitamin will promote the proper functioning of the endocrine system, strengthen the body to fight estrogen contaminants, and boost free testosterone to optimal levels.

Virility Vitamin is comprised of phytonutrients, natural chemicals found in plants, to protect men's testosterone, vigor and manliness against the hazards of the modern world.

What is in the Virility Vitamin that makes it work so well?

All of the ingredients in VV are backed up by both academic research, and many years of use in folk medicine. Phytonutrients are beneficial chemicals found in plants, an exciting area of medical research that holds great promise for the future. These isolated phytonutrients and supporting additives are present in the vitamin:

  • Maca - a vegetable in the broccoli family resembling a turnip. It was grown in Peru where it was used as an aphrodisiac. It benefits both genders sexually, and is not known to interact negatively with any hormone.
  • Mucuna Pruriens - velvet bean is a bean that grows from trees which is a good source of L-DOPA. As L-DOPA levels increase in the body, prolactin (a protein that inhibits erections, and causes the refractory period) drops. It also promotes optimal levels of serotonin, which has been shown to delay ejaculation.
  • Eurycoma/Tongkat Ali - pro-fertility agent and aphrodisiac that has a large body of evidence supporting its anti-estrogen agency. It also contains 9H6One which promotes erections and delays ejaculation.
  • Grape Seed Extract - enhances blood flow and decreases estrogen levels.
  • L-Citrulline - turns into L-Arginine (a beneficial protein) after absorption, which proves to be a better source of L-Arginine than taking L-Arginine directly, regulates blood flow and promote stronger erections.
  • Bioperene - black pepper extract, increases absorption of active ingredients
  • Astragin - a natural compound composed of highly fractionated Astragalus and Panax Notoginseng, another absorption enhancer to increase effectiveness of VV dose.
What's next for Virility Labs, LLC. after Virility Vitamin?

We will be preparing our next product: 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one (9-HC-6-one)

9-hydroxycanthin-6-one (9-HC-6-one), a b-carboline alkaloid isolated from Eurycoma longifolia Jack, also known as Tongkat Ali, is a plant native to Indonesia and Malaysia that is known for its testosterone boosting and libido enhancing properties. Tongkat ali increases the strength of erections, and the b-carboline alkaloid 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one has been identified as the source of this erection enhancing property. It enhances erections by interfering with Ca2+ mobilization. This is a totally different mechanism of action than Viagra and other current erectile dysfunction drugs. Consequently, 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one has the potential to induce erections as effectively as Viagra, but without as many side effects. Furthermore, 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one has an additional benefit, it treats premature ejaculation. Studies show that 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one increased the time between penetration and ejaculation by 400%, a result equivalent to the drug Clomipramine, which is used to treat premature ejaculation. However, 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one has the potential to treat premature ejaculation with far fewer side effects than Clomipramine. Clomipramine is an antidepressant that has been known to decrease or even ruin men's libidos. By contrast, 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one is not an antidepressant and has positive effects on libido.

While Tongkat Ali, and by extension its component 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one, is currently an ingredient in Virility Vitamin, 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one has not been isolated for commercial use. The concentrations of 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one  in Tongkat Ali are very small, approximately 1% of the Tongkat Ali plant. Virility Labs would like to create an over the counter supplement that will include large, concentrated amounts of 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one.

First, Virilty Labs must conduct additional tests on 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one to determine side effects. The study listed below shows that the substance is non-toxic, however, a more detailed analysis of its side effects is necessary.

Second, Virility Labs must create a synthetic equivalent to 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one in a laboratory. It is not economically feasible to buy the tons of Tongkat ali plants that would be necessary in order to extract a commercially viable amount of 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one. Therefore, creating a synthetic equivalent of 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one is the best option.

Third, Virilty Labs must increase the bio-oral availability of 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one. In the aforementioned study, 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one was administered via injection. Injection is not convenient on a daily basis, therefore an oral delivery system must be delivered. Virility Labs has several ideas for ensuring oral delivery, such as imbedding the 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one molecules within phytosomes.

If Virility Labs accomplishes these goals, it will have brought to the market an affordable supplement that allows men to experience optimal erections and delayed ejaculation with minimal side effects.

Why aren't drug companies working on 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one?

Unfortunately, the patent laws disincentivize drug companies bringing natural compounds to the market. Compounds found in nature, such as 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one, cannot be patented and therefore the drug companies cannot monopolize the sale of the compound, which results in lower prices and, consequently, lower profits for them when compared to their patented products.

With your crowd funding support, Virilty Labs will attempt to bring this product to the market so that men and their partners can benefit from on-demand peak sexual performance.


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Tell your friends about the company and the product and what it can do for them.
  • Keep up with the Brodyssey via our blog: www.theofficialbrodyssey.blogspot.com
  • Like us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter for more information and updates: facebook.com/virilitylabs

And that’s all there is to it.

Thank you so much,


Clark

Owner

Virility Labs, LLC.

story_txt: Short SummaryVirility Vitamin is the flagship product of Virility Labs, LLC. We are a new, ambitious health supplement company devoted to self-improvement and betterment. In response to the dangerously decreasing average levels of testosterone in men, (contributing to obesity, depression, sexual inability, etc.) we have created the world's best male sexual health supplement.Ingredients included in Virility Vitamin have been scientifically proven to provide: increased rigidity of erections increased duration of erections delayed ejaculation increased intensity of ejaculation increased volume of ejaculate decrease length of refractory period In addition to these benefits, a healthier hormonal balance and higher testosterone will improve psychological health as well increase effectiveness of diet and exercise.The BrodysseyTo celebrate the launch of Virility Vitamin and the IndieGoGo campaign, Virility Labs is launching the world's first official Bro-Odyssey, an exhaustive 30 day self-improvement journey. The program will be updated live daily via blogspot, and video journals will be uploaded biweekly to the Virility Labs YouTube channel.The Brodyssey includes programs and supplements from sources such as: Jamie Lewis at Chaos and Pain, Roosh V from Return of Kings, Rob Regish and all the guys at Mass Pro, Bryan Haycock from Think Muscle, Timothy Ferris from 4-Hour Work Week and many more.For updates, check out:www.theofficialbrodyssey.blogspot.com What We Need & What You Get Our funding goal is $50,000.00 USD. This will fund the procurement of supplies, necessary testing, encapsulation, bottling, labeling, and shipping of the first batch of Virility Vitamin, as well as an initial wave of marketing presence establishment. Any additional funding over our goal will be directly routed to Research & Development to conduct testing on 9-Hydroxycanthin-6-One, a b-carboline alkaloid isolated from the plant E.longifolia, shown in a promising study to promote penile erection and delay ejaculation by 400%If our funding goal is met, we will have the first batch of Virility Vitamin shipping out within 1-3 months of the completion of the campaign.Within 3-6 months, increase production levels of VV.Within 6-12 months, begin R&D for 9H6One.Within 12-18 months, develop a supplement utilizing 9H6One.The ImpactWhat makes VV different from other similar male sexual health supplements?Made in America - Virility Labs, LLC is proud to source all of its products from reputable American suppliers, and are subject to extensive quality and safety testing. High and Consistent Concentration of Active Components - VV contains ingredients that have high concentrations of phytonutrients. HPLC tested - All VV ingredients are tested by High-Performance Liquid Chromatography, one of the most accurate tests for measuring the level of active ingredients in supplements. You can be certain the advertised quantity is correct. Toxicity tested. Phytosome utilization - A complex of a natural active ingredient and a phospholipid, phytosomes increase absorption of herbal extracts, consequently, the active ingredients in VV are enhanced for better absorption. High dosage  - Many supplement companies sell potentially beneficial products in quantities and doses too small to be effective. VV  contains more than the minimum effective dose of each active nutrient, only possible through the usage of: Micronization - This technology makes particles smaller, thus allowing more ingredients to fit into a smaller space. You will not have to swallow a large number of pills to get an effective dose. Absorption Enhancers - Apart from the phytosomes and micronization, additional absorption enhancers are included in VV, bioperene and astragin, which together boost the absorption of the active ingredients another 100%, increasing the already impressive potency of the vitamin. Why do you need Virility Vitamin?Studies indicate that the average level of testosterone in men has decreased every generation for over one hundred years. Cell phone radiation, estrogen contamination in food and water, un-athletic, sedentary lifestyles, and unhealthy, fattening food all contribute to the negative trend.Estrogen, although necessary even in the male body in small amounts, wreaks havoc on a man's body in concentrations any higher than necessary.Other contaminants that are not necessarily estrogen still cause a decrease in testosterone levels, such as cell phone radiation.In addition, the male body did not evolve to sit in a desk all day, eating french fries and be drained psychologically by the rigors of the modern workforce. It appears as though a perfect storm of factors has amassed to lower healthy male hormone levels, thus stealing a man's health and zest for life.This is causing a gradual decrease in masculinity over time, more difficulty building muscle, less clear thinking, less ability to stabilize positive moods, more storage of body fat and many other effects.One of the most drastic changes has been the deterioration of man's sexual capacity. Studies show that up to 78% of people that are married or are in a long-term, monogamous relationship are dissatisfied with their sex lives. Erectile dysfunction is at an all-time high; premature ejaculation is much more common that it should be. Even if you believe yourself to be already healthy and virile, you will still notice a powerful, positive effect upon taking VV. This vitamin will promote the proper functioning of the endocrine system, strengthen the body to fight estrogen contaminants, and boost free testosterone to optimal levels.Virility Vitamin is comprised of phytonutrients, natural chemicals found in plants, to protect men's testosterone, vigor and manliness against the hazards of the modern world.What is in the Virility Vitamin that makes it work so well?All of the ingredients in VV are backed up by both academic research, and many years of use in folk medicine. Phytonutrients are beneficial chemicals found in plants, an exciting area of medical research that holds great promise for the future. These isolated phytonutrients and supporting additives are present in the vitamin: Maca - a vegetable in the broccoli family resembling a turnip. It was grown in Peru where it was used as an aphrodisiac. It benefits both genders sexually, and is not known to interact negatively with any hormone. Mucuna Pruriens - velvet bean is a bean that grows from trees which is a good source of L-DOPA. As L-DOPA levels increase in the body, prolactin (a protein that inhibits erections, and causes the refractory period) drops. It also promotes optimal levels of serotonin, which has been shown to delay ejaculation. Eurycoma/Tongkat Ali - pro-fertility agent and aphrodisiac that has a large body of evidence supporting its anti-estrogen agency. It also contains 9H6One which promotes erections and delays ejaculation. Grape Seed Extract - enhances blood flow and decreases estrogen levels. L-Citrulline - turns into L-Arginine (a beneficial protein) after absorption, which proves to be a better source of L-Arginine than taking L-Arginine directly, regulates blood flow and promote stronger erections. Bioperene - black pepper extract, increases absorption of active ingredients Astragin - a natural compound composed of highly fractionated Astragalus and Panax Notoginseng, another absorption enhancer to increase effectiveness of VV dose. What's next for Virility Labs, LLC. after Virility Vitamin?We will be preparing our next product: 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one (9-HC-6-one) 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one (9-HC-6-one), a b-carboline alkaloid isolated from Eurycoma longifolia Jack, also known as Tongkat Ali, is a plant native to Indonesia and Malaysia that is known for its testosterone boosting and libido enhancing properties. Tongkat ali increases the strength of erections, and the b-carboline alkaloid 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one has been identified as the source of this erection enhancing property. It enhances erections by interfering with Ca2+ mobilization. This is a totally different mechanism of action than Viagra and other current erectile dysfunction drugs. Consequently, 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one has the potential to induce erections as effectively as Viagra, but without as many side effects. Furthermore, 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one has an additional benefit, it treats premature ejaculation. Studies show that 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one increased the time between penetration and ejaculation by 400%, a result equivalent to the drug Clomipramine, which is used to treat premature ejaculation. However, 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one has the potential to treat premature ejaculation with far fewer side effects than Clomipramine. Clomipramine is an antidepressant that has been known to decrease or even ruin men's libidos. By contrast, 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one is not an antidepressant and has positive effects on libido. While Tongkat Ali, and by extension its component 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one, is currently an ingredient in Virility Vitamin, 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one has not been isolated for commercial use. The concentrations of 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one  in Tongkat Ali are very small, approximately 1% of the Tongkat Ali plant. Virility Labs would like to create an over the counter supplement that will include large, concentrated amounts of 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one. First, Virilty Labs must conduct additional tests on 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one to determine side effects. The study listed below shows that the substance is non-toxic, however, a more detailed analysis of its side effects is necessary. Second, Virility Labs must create a synthetic equivalent to 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one in a laboratory. It is not economically feasible to buy the tons of Tongkat ali plants that would be necessary in order to extract a commercially viable amount of 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one. Therefore, creating a synthetic equivalent of 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one is the best option. Third, Virilty Labs must increase the bio-oral availability of 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one. In the aforementioned study, 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one was administered via injection. Injection is not convenient on a daily basis, therefore an oral delivery system must be delivered. Virility Labs has several ideas for ensuring oral delivery, such as imbedding the 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one molecules within phytosomes. If Virility Labs accomplishes these goals, it will have brought to the market an affordable supplement that allows men to experience optimal erections and delayed ejaculation with minimal side effects. Why aren't drug companies working on 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one?Unfortunately, the patent laws disincentivize drug companies bringing natural compounds to the market. Compounds found in nature, such as 9-hydroxycanthin-6-one, cannot be patented and therefore the drug companies cannot monopolize the sale of the compound, which results in lower prices and, consequently, lower profits for them when compared to their patented products. With your crowd funding support, Virilty Labs will attempt to bring this product to the market so that men and their partners can benefit from on-demand peak sexual performance. Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help: Tell your friends about the company and the product and what it can do for them. Keep up with the Brodyssey via our blog: www.theofficialbrodyssey.blogspot.com Like us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter for more information and updates: facebook.com/virilitylabs And that’s all there is to it.Thank you so much,ClarkOwnerVirility Labs, LLC.Pertinent References and CitationsDecline in Men’s testosterone between generations – Travison TG, Araujo AB, O’Donnell AB, et al. story:
Short Summary

My church, Beulah Baptist Institutional Church, located in Tampa,Florida started a medical outreach ministry for the poor and under served children and families in Jamaica approximately ten years ago.  We started with the idea of helping to facilitate the delivery of free, accessible and quality healthcare services to the poor in rural and under served communities in Jamaica and in correctional institutions.Our initial focus was on the Parish of St.Catherine.

The catalyst for this program was a native-born Jamaican couple, Leslie and Elloreece Burrell, who had been engaged in this health outreach with other organizations since 1997. Leslie has since passed but Elloreece continues to lead, direct and expand this mission throughout Jamaica with a volunteer team of doctors, nurses, pharmacists, counselors, ministers, and administrative assistants.  Beulah Baptist Institutional Church and Mrs. Burrell’s efforts have been acknowledged and honored at the highest levels of Jamaican Government, she as a caring member of the Jamaican Diaspora and Beulah Baptist a church which takes seriously its call to be a servant leader.

Since 2004 our mission team has made a major difference in the provision of healthcare relief for this under served population of Jamaicans, who in most cases get to receive medical treatment only when we make our annual visits to their communities.  While there are other missions throughout the country they are not enough and observing the existing conditions breaks your heart.


What We Need & What You Get

 Annually our team from Beulah Baptist Institutional Church travel to Jamaica to provide medical treatment, counseling, medicines and to tell all about the Love and saving Grace of God our Father.All of the medical personnel volunteer their services,but all other costs of the trip such as flights,food &lodging,supplies,medicines,medical license fees,local transportation,security,insurance and local administration assistance must be paid by the mission.The total estimated cost this year is $31,500.00 disbursed as follows;

Flights                    $8600.00

Food &Lodging      $6500.00

Medicine                $8000.00

Supplies                $4500.00

Local Transport     $1200.00

Insurance             $   750.00

Security                $   750.00

Med Licenses       $   700.00

Local Admn           $   500.00

     Total                                           $31,500.00

  • If we don't reach our total goal all collected funds will be used solely for the Medical Mission at a level commensurate with the contributions levels and church funds.

The Impact

There are plenty of countries with citizens in similar conditions as there are in Jamaica and need help also but we have been called to this area and are intent on making a difference for the good of these people in need.While much remains to be done we are confident that with your help and God's blessings we are making a difference.When people find out we are coming and start lining up at the crack of dawn or aged women set out walking from the hills at night to be seen by the doctor you thank God for this opportunity to serve and show His love.But it makes you cry when a senior citizen's monthly pension or assistance is equal to the cost of exactly one pill she needs for her medical condition and she hasn't had any since the 60 day supply we gave her last year ran out.This mission is very important and we need your help. 

Here is a listing of our efforts in Jamaica since this mission began and some of what we have accomplished:

·  Provided medications,supplies and equipment valued at over $450,000.

·  Treated over 5,500 patients and provided home visits for some who couldn't get to healthcare centers.

·  Counseled some 4,000 students at schools and health fairs.

·  Delivered over 3,000+ books.

·  Visited women’s correctional institutions and provided medical treatment and counseling.

·  Established and funded vocational programs in boys’ correctional institutions.

·  Provided barber chairs, supplies, tools and equipment for barber training programs.

·  Ministered to all and shared with them the important concept of salvation through Jesus Christ.

As you can see, over the years we have done a good job but there still remains plenty to accomplish.

You can help us make a difference in the lives of these people by joining hands and hearts through love and being a blessing to someone in need. 

Other Ways You Can Help

To you, as my friends and “Christian family,” I am asking first for your prayers that God would continue to bless this mission, our church, the volunteer outreach team and the people of Jamaica through His Word and the medical treatments we provide. Secondly, if you have an inclination to join us on this mission and are moved by what we do, we welcome your talents. Thirdly, if you have a passion for service and would like to establish a medical team through your church or organization to help us expand and provide more frequent medical services we are ready to assist you.  Lastly, because these efforts are funded by contributions I am personally asking for a gift from you to help us continue this great work and service. This year’s mission is scheduled to depart June 4, 2015 and return on June 13, 2015.

If you can't contribute financially you still can help us by getting the word out about this mission to other who may help and particularly to the Jamaican Diaspora.Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools as you help us spread the word about this mission and requests for contributions.

· 
Delivered
over 3,000+ books.
· 
Visited
women’s correctional institutions and provided medical treatment and
counseling.
· 
Established
and funded vocational programs in boys’ correctional institutions.
· 
Provided
barber chairs, supplies, tools and equipment for barber training programs.
· 
Ministered
to all and shared with them the important concept of salvation through Jesus
Christ.
As you can
see, over the years we have done a good job but there still remains plenty to
accomplish.You can help us make a difference in the lives of these people by joining hands and hearts through love and being a blessing to someone in need. Other Ways You Can HelpTo you, as my friends and “Christian family,” I am asking first for your prayers that God would continue to bless this mission, our church, the volunteer outreach team and the people of Jamaica through His Word and the medical treatments we provide. Secondly, if you have an inclination to join us on this mission and are moved by what we do, we welcome your talents. Thirdly, if you have a passion for service and would like to establish a medical team through your church or organization to help us expand and provide more frequent medical services we are ready to assist you.  Lastly, because these efforts are funded by contributions I am personally asking for a gift from you to help us continue this great work and service. This year’s mission is scheduled to depart June 4, 2015 and return on June 13, 2015.If you can't contribute financially you still can help us by getting the word out about this mission to other who may help and particularly to the Jamaican Diaspora.Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools as you help us spread the word about this mission and requests for contributions.

story:
Help Mckinley Go Back to Not Back to School Camp!

Mckinley Ropers is a 14-year-old, hopelessly unsocialized homeschooler who lives in Ashland, Oregon.

Two weeks ago she attended Not Back to School Camp—a summer camp for teenage homeschoolers—and it changed her life. Suddenly, the world was meaningful again. She met incredible new friends (like the one featured on the right in the picture above). Birds chirped. Flowers bloomed.

Now Mckinley needs your help to return to another session of Not Back to School Camp that starts in less than a week! If she can raise $1200, she'll be able to attend. If not, she'll enter a downward spiral of camp-deprived despair.

Please take a moment to give what you can to poor Mckinley. She's offering some awesome perks in return for your donation.

If Mckinley doesn't reach her goal, your donation will be 100% refunded. So what's to lose? Send her something right now. (You can donate any amount of money, not just the quantities listed.)

If you can't donate, we'd love for you to share this campaign on Facebook with a personal note. Perhaps something like, "Hey this crazy girl is trying to raise $1000 in three days!"

Thank you for supporting Mckinley's dream!

[This campaign is managed by Blake Boles, a Not Back to School Camp staffer. All donations go directly to McKinley.]

Chief needs help!


Extreme Disney fan Ed "Chief" Barlow is in some serious shit. He AND his wife have both been diagnosed with cancer at the SAME TIME! It's a horrible situation as they have no source of income at this time. 

How can you help the co-founder of Mesa Verde Times?

It's easy. 

1. Spread the word through your blog, podcast, etc.

2. Give a couple of bucks. It's all through Paypal so it's nice and safe.

3. Give a shitload of bucks and get some prizes!

story:
Hey friends! Before we dive into the details,  we are excited to share with you a testimonial we received recently.



Can you think of a time in your life (or in the life of someone close to you) when you were not in the best of health, either physically, emotionally or spiritually?
And a little bit of prayer from people was something you really could do with?

But honestly, how many people really prayed for you? If you are not a celebrity, then probably just a few, or maybe no one!

Now, how about getting several people around the world to pray for you and send you healing energy? How about... say, 10, 20, 50, or even 100 people? Or probably even more?

Until now, there was no organized way through which this was possible. But now it is.

Welcome to Healingg.com!

Healingg.com is a unique, global platform for sending and receiving healing prayers from people around the world - people who believe in helping others, and in doing good.

So how does this work? Simple! Healingg.com provides 2 channels through which users can receive healing,

Channel 1. Get healing/prayers through our community:

Firstly, users can easily submit healing cases and start receiving prayers and distance healing from others around the world, at no cost. This is the channel through which majority of the healing is sent.

This is a very effective channel because people across continents, regardless of their religious backgrounds, believe in prayers and their tremendous capacity to heal. 

And when multiple people  send prayers to someone, the results are even more effective because these prayers carry the good intention of an entire community that believes in helping others.


Channel 2. Get healing through professional Healers / Practitioners:

Secondly, users can avail professional healing services through the healers / practitioners listed on our site.

Healingg.com is a great place to search for alternative healers and practitioners across different healing modalities.  We bring together the whole gamut of global alternative healers under one roof, with exhaustive details about each of them, including client reviews and testimonials.

This channel is for users who need professional healing.

There is an ever-increasing belief in alternative healing therapies like Reiki, Pranic Healing, Yoga, Hypnotherapy, Meditation, Ayurveda etc. Over the last few decades, a growing number of people have started practicing these therapies, and even more people are claiming to benefit from them.

With escalating costs of modern medicine and their unwanted side-effects, many people are now becoming more holistic in their approach to healing, and are turning towards alternative healing therapies.

According to Global Industry Analysts, the global alternative medicine sector is expected to reach close to $115 billion by 2015,  This gives us a fair idea about the growing interest in alternative healing methods.

                                                  (Image Credit: FreeDigitalPhotos.net and Twobee)


A few years ago, we created a web app on Happiness called Revelri.com, where we included a small section on distance healing, called Synergy. But very frankly, this was just another section (out of the many we had), and we were not expecting much out it.

Now, it so happened that as soon as we launched Revelri, Synergy became the most popular part of our website! Hundreds of people started posting their healing cases and thousands of people sent them healing. And so many people reported being healed.

So it was only by this "accident" that we realized that people not only wanted to receive prayers, but they even wanted to pray for others whom they did not even know! We were pleasantly amazed to see such a strong desire to help, and get helped!

Given below is a long screenshot of the "healed" section of Synergy. You can see the various kinds of healing cases that were submitted, and the number of people who sent their healing prayers (the number in the pink heart denotes the number of people who prayed).

After realizing how much Synergy was helping our members, we became serious about getting it out to the world. We expanded our idea further, and gave Synergy a unique identity of it's own, in the form of Healingg.com

We launched Healingg.com a few months ago, and with very little promotion, we already have around 300 healers on board. Many members have submitted healing cases and have received healing from our existing community. And yes, people are benefiting from it. The testimonial we shared in the beginning of this page is an example.

Since we have recently started, the numbers are low right now. But we know it is just a matter of time before more people come to know about us.

Healingg.com is not something that we "feel" will help people. It is a tried and tested model. We have seen so many people benefit from Synergy. And we are sure we can replicate it on Healingg.com as well, with a much bigger and wider reach.

The funds we receive from our campaign will primarily be used for the following:

           

           


1.  Marketing (70% - About $10,500)
The biggest work in front of us is to promote Healingg.com to a lot of people.
We need to market it extensively to let people know that this is a great way to receive healing. Not just that, we also need to get more alternative practitioners on board,

We plan to allocate about 70% of our funds for this.

Broadly, the marketing funds will be used for:
- Social media marketing
- Email marketing
- Print advertising
- Traveling expenses

2. Improving our existing website (30% - About $4,500)
About 30% of the funds will be used to improve the overall performance of our existing website (improve load-time, upgrade our server, improve design etc). We will need to hire one part-time developer for this.

In case our campaign exceeds our funding goal, we will use the additional amount to ramp up our marketing endeavors. The more we can spend on marketing, the more people will we be able to help.

We cannot stress enough how much your contribution will impact the world. Your contribution will help us reach out to many more people, so that they can heal all aspects of their lives.

And who knows, in due course, Healingg.com might be the first place people would prefer going to for any kind of healing -  physical, emotional or spiritual.



Ok, now, so a little bit about myself! My name is Abhishek Agarwal. I am married to my beautiful wife, Nam and we have a cute little 18-month old daughter, Mohi. Here is a pic of ours when Mohi was 1 year old.

         


Last year I got selected for Awesomeness Fest, a fast-growing movement where like-minded people come together to push humanity forward.
Here is a photo of me with Lisa Nichols, a popular star from the blockbuster movie (and the book), The Secret, by Rhonda Byrne.


My Team
Apart from myself, I have my close friend Naveed, in my team. He is a top-notch techie and handles all our tech details, things that go over my head!  He is an awesome designer as well, a master strategist and comes up with some great ideas. He shares my vision, and has always been of tremendous help in all our ventures. I am happy to have him in my team.

I also consider my wonderful family as part of my team. They have always been very supportive of my vision for making this a better world.

Personally, I have a good amount of experience working online.

- I have been a full-time Internet marketer for over a decade.
- Ex-PowerSeller on eBay India, having sold over 14,000 products.
- Over the years, I have created over 200 niche websites.
- Built a subscriber-base of over 100,000 users.
- Created Revelri.com that now has around 14,000 members.
- I am also ranked as #3 in a list of over 400,000 expert authors on EzineArticles, the Internet's foremost article directory.
http://ezinearticles.com/?type=experts


I absolutely loved what I did in my Internet marketing career. However, a couple of years ago, I had a strong calling to create something that would make a positive impact on our planet. Driven by this idea, we created Revelri, to spread happiness.  And now, we created Healingg, to spread more holistic ways of healing.

Although I am not a professional healer, I have had several personal experiences in healing others and myself. I have also seen other healers do some amazing healing 'miracles'. 

So, I have a strong, unshakeable belief in alternative healing. I know it works, and I am now driven by the idea of making it easy for others to experience it first-hand, so that they too can live a life full of joy, happiness and abundance.

Through Healingg.com we want to make a positive change in the lives of people. We want to unify those who believe in doing good through prayers and healing... no matter what caste, creed or religion they belong to. And we need your help in doing that.

So, please support us. And together, let's make this world a healthier and happier place.


We do understand that not everyone who sees this page will contribute. That is absolutely all right :)

But it will be great if you can spread the word and let people know about our campaign and what we want to achieve. That will be great support in itself!

You can use the IndieGoGo tools to spread the word.

story:
I have created the opportunity to move my office into a yurt in the spacious, lush, and undeveloped backyard of a flourishing integrated health center in Portland, Oregon.  My vision is to create a garden space adjacent to the yurt.  My therapy practice will transform from an urban office into a garden-based oasis that will be named Ground. 

My practice will provide individuals, couples, and families the opportunity to participate in therapy from the tranquility of a garden, within the beauty of a yurt.  I will be drawing from horticultural therapy and ecopsychology techniques, in order to promote a cutting edge alternative to traditional talk therapy.   We will work in the garden together at times, to deepen our relationship and further the connection to the natural world.  The move of my practice will also allow me to join a vibrant group of practitioners, across modalities, which will further boost the referral network for my practice. 

The only thing separating me from making Ground reality is the yurt itself. That is where you all fit in. $8500 will be the minimum needed to purchase the base model yurt, along with materials to build a platform for yurt to sit on. Anything above and beyond this amount will allow for added features, such as: insulation, premium top cover, glass windows, french doors, snow/wind support, etc.  Each additional feature will further add to the quality of the therapeutic experience I am providing.

Thank you so much for any support you may offer, as small or large as it may be.   With your help, we are making this possible to be built from the Ground, and for that I am truly grateful.  You will also be helping in the lives of countless others who will benefit from this service while they embark on a path of healing and growth.  

All the best,

Mitch Bacon

story:
You wouldn’t just run 23 miles and call it a marathon. You wouldn’t go to the gym and not know exactly how much you’re lifting. Then why would you sacrifice accuracy when it comes to measuring your body’s functions like heart or breathing rate? Knowing your boundaries means understanding when to push your limits and when you are in danger of over training. That’s why we created SenseON, the first clinically accurate heart rate monitor that’s incredibly comfortable to wear. 

Connect with your body.


With a low profile design that flexes with your movements, SenseON will fit effortlessly into your daily routine.


View your progress.

Get meaningful feedback every time you workout. A comfortable all-day fit allows you to get valuable data like heart rate recovery.


Push your limits.

Knowing your boundaries means being able to avoid over or under training.  Do what you could not do yesterday.


Track your activity.

Get all of your fitness data in one place. SenseON tracks total steps, distance covered, calories burned, heart rate recovery, etc.

We knew there had to be another option. Since wristbands use LED light to detect your pulse, they require you to be absolutely still for optimal performance (meaning that when you need them, they don’t work). Chest strap monitors can be somewhat accurate, but they chafe, retain odor, need batteries replacements, and are flat out uncomfortable.

Connect SenseON with your preferred smartphone or fitness watch

Peel off the tape protector.


Find a dry area on the left side of your chest to adhere SenseON and then simply tap twice to activate it. 

HeBE ™ Sensing Electrodes

Made with 304 titanium plated stainless steel, these electrodes are highly conductive, resistant to erosion, and harmless to your body.

BiPA ™ Technology

By employing the latest BiPA ™ technology, SenseOn continuously captures the heart’s electrical pulses at an accuracy level of ±1 BPM (the same process used in medical EKG's). 


SenseON ™ Tape

By using specially designed medical grade tape, SenseOn can resist sweat and water, giving you the freedom to train like you always do. 


Cordless Charging

The portable charging case is SenseON’s home base. When you are done working out, simply put it back into the case and it will conveniently be charged for your next workout. The case delivers 8 full charges and each charge is good for 20 hours of continuous use.


“I really tried to get into the habit of using a chest strap monitor, but the chafing always left me frustrated and eventually it just sat on my shelf. SenseON is totally different. When I train, SenseON does it’s thing, and I do mine. It’s obvious that is was designed with the ATHLETE in mind.”
-Alexis, 31 - Triathlete

“I’m a tech junkie and somewhat new to endurance sports. When I first started out, I tried nearly every major monitor on the market. I was surprised to find that they all seemed very ‘2004’ in their overall function and user-friendliness. So glad I found SenseON. It’s a powerful piece of hardware in a simple package.”
-Jeff, 43 - Age Grouper



When can I select my color?

We'll send out a survey shortly after the campaign ends where we'll ask you for your color choice.

How does SenseON connect to my phone?

SenseON connects to your phone via Bluetooth.

Is the app free?

Yes, the app for SenseON is called cardiocycle, it is totally free and is already available for download.

Does the app work for Android and iPhone?

Yes, the app will work for both Android and iPhone.

Shipping?

We’ll begin production in August, and ship SenseON in September 2016. We’ll keep you updated regarding our project milestones.

Can you ship to different countries?

Yes, but please be aware of the specific import taxes and tariffs of the country you live in.

How much is shipping?

Shipping is free to anywhere in the world. 

What is SenseON's warranty?

SenseON has a 1-year limited manufacturer's warranty.

What is SenseON and how does it work?

SenseON is a water resistant, rechargeable, wearable device that adheres comfortably to your torso and continuously tracks your heart rate, physical activity, and other vital bio signals  – during activity, rest, recovery, and sleep. SenseON is applied to the left side of your torso, where a super-sensitive sensor captures a clear heart rate signal. It uses the industry standard Bluetooth 4.0 to continuously communicate with your mobile app of choice and display real time data and insights.

What does SenseON track?

  • Heart rate and heart rate zones

  • Breadth rate

  • Resting heart rate when worn while sleeping

  • Heart rate recovery

  • Steps

  • Distances

  • Calories burned

  • Sleep


How do I wear the SenseON?

SenseON is worn on the left side of the torso, under the left pectoral muscle.  For women, it should be positioned just below the sports bra.  To wear it, you will put a new adhesive on it, then simply remove the backing from the adhesive and press it firmly to your body (Just like a Band-Aid®).

How often should I replace my adhesives?

You should replace the adhesive with a new one each time you put SenseON on.

How much will the replacement adhesives cost?

3-6 month supply of adhesives(30 pieces) cost $6.99.

Is the battery rechargeable or does it need to be replaced?

SenseON comes with a cordless charging case. The rechargeable battery will last up to 20 hours per charge and take about 30 minutes to recharge. The charging case can charge SenseON 8 times before it needs to be recharged.

Can I swim with the SenseON in water?

You cannot track heart rate while swimming with SenseON, but SenseON is waterproof to IP67.

Is SenseON FDA approved?

No. SenseON is intended for consumer use only and is not a medical device.

Which devices are compatible with SenseON?

The SenseON can be used with Bluetooth 4.0 mobile devices such as smart phones and some sport watches.

Will SenseON work with my existing apps?

SenseON is compatible with fitness apps that support BlueTooth heart rate monitors, such as EndoMondo, Polar Beat and RunKeeper.

Who should I contact with questions about my order?

Please contact our Support team at info@cardiocycle.net with any questions related to your order.
